T02bsu034_u:629: bāhuśrutyasmi śikṣitvā buddhadharmā na durlabhāḥ // SRS_3.20 //
T02bsu034_u:631: bahu asaṃyatā bhikṣu bāhuśrutye anarthikāḥ // SRS_3.21 //

T02bsu034_u:636: candanasya yathā kaścid bhāṣate puruṣo guṇān /

T02bsu034_u:638: athānyaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛccheta taṃ naram /

T02bsu034_u:641: sa naraṃ taṃ pratibrūyād gandhavarṇaṃ bravīmyaham /

T02bsu034_u:644: paścime bheṣyate kāle śīlaṃ caiṣāṃ na bheṣyate // SRS_3.27 //
T02bsu034_u:646: paścime bheṣyate kāle samādhiścaiṣāṃ na bheṣyate // SRS_3.28 //
T02bsu034_u:648: bheṣyate paścime kāle prajñā caiṣāṃ na bheṣyate // SRS_3.29 //
T02bsu034_u:650: bheṣyate paścime kāle vimuktiścaiṣāṃ na bheṣyate // SRS_3.30 //
T02bsu034_u:651: yatha puruṣu daridru kaścideva sace paribhūtu bhavenmahājanasya /

T02bsu034_u:654: marumanujakumbhāṇḍarākṣasā no yatha puruṣu daridru arthahīnaḥ // SRS_3.32
T02bsu034_u:655: yada punariya labdha bhoti bhūmī atuliyu dharmanidhānu paṇḍitena /
T02bsu034_u:656: maru manuja spṛhaṃ janenti tatra sa ca dhanu deti niruttaraṃ prajānām //
T02bsu034_u:657: tasma imi śruṇitva ānuśaṃsāṃ paramapraṇītayaḥ kīrtitā jinena /
T02bsu034_u:658: sarva jahiya jñātralābhasaukhyamimu varamuddiśathā samādhi śāntam //
T02bsu034_u:659: ye keci buddhā diśatā sunirvṛtā anāgatā ye 'pi ca pratyutpannāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:660: sarve ca śikṣitva iha samādhau bodhiṃ vibuddhā atulāmacintiyām // SRS_3.35
T02bsu034_u:662: candraprabhaḥ kumāru hṛṣṭacittaḥ puratu jinasya sthihitva vāca bhāṣī /
T02bsu034_u:663: ahu puruṣavarasya nirvṛtasya sukisari kāli idaṃ dhariṣye sūtram //
T02bsu034_u:664: kāya ahu tyajitva jīvitaṃ ca tathapi ca saukhya yadasti loke /
T02bsu034_u:665: tatra ahu mahābhaye 'pi kāle imu varu śānta samādhi dhārayiṣye // SRS_3.37
T02bsu034_u:666: mahakaruṇa janitva sattvakāye sudukhita sattva anātha prāpta dṛṣṭvā /
T02bsu034_u:667: teṣvahamupasaṃharitva maitrīmimu vara śānta samādhi deśayiṣye // SRS_3.38
T02bsu034_u:668: pañcaśata anūna tasmin kāle ya utthita tatra samādhidhārakāṇām /
T02bsu034_u:669: pūrvaṃgama kumāra teṣa āsīdiha varasūtraparigrahe udāre // SRS_3.39 //
T02bsu034_u:673: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - samādhiḥ samādhiriti bhagavannucyate
T02bsu034_u:676: samādhiḥ samādhiriti kumāra ucyate yaduta cittanidhyāptiḥ |
T02bsu034_u:719: sarvajñajñāne tīvracchandatā samādhiḥ samādhiriti kumāra ucyate |
T02bsu034_u:721: pratipattirapratipattiḥ, ayaṃ sa kumāra ucyate samādhiriti ||
T02bsu034_u:722: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:723: apāvṛtaṃ me amṛtasya dvāram ācakṣito dharmasvabhāvu yādṛśaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:726: vaneṣu vastavya gaṇān jahitvā maitraṃ ca cittaṃ sada bhāvanīyam // SRS_4.2
T02bsu034_u:727: śuddhaṃ ca śīlaṃ sada rakṣitavyaṃ dhūteṣu puṣṭiḥ sada vinditavyā /
T02bsu034_u:731: tato labhitvā ima śāntabhūmi yasyāmabhūmiḥ pṛthu śrāvakāṇām /
T02bsu034_u:733: dṛṣṭvā narān bhājanabuddhimantān tān bodhicittasmi samādahetha /
T02bsu034_u:734: anuttare jñāni pratiṣṭhapitvā na durlabho eṣa samādhirājaḥ // SRS_4.5 //
T02bsu034_u:735: yasyārthi īrṣā puna saṃjaneyyā āhāri niṣyandiha pratyavekṣataḥ /
T02bsu034_u:736: paryeṣṭitaśco paribhogataśca na durlabho eṣa samādhi bheṣyate // SRS_4.6
T02bsu034_u:737: samādhirājo yadi vaiṣa śūnyato viśuddhaśīlānayu mūrdhni tiṣṭhati /
T02bsu034_u:738: svabhāvato dharma sadā samāhitā bālā na jānanti ayuktayogāḥ // SRS_4.7 //
T02bsu034_u:739: yeṣāmayaṃ śānta samādhiriṣṭo na teṣa jātu bhayabuddhi tiṣṭhati /
T02bsu034_u:741: ākārato yaḥ smarate tathāgatān sa bhoti śāntendriyu śāntamānasaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:742: abhrāntacittaḥ satataṃ samāhitaḥ śrutena jñānena ca sāgaropamaḥ // SRS_4.9
T02bsu034_u:743: asmin samādhau hi pratiṣṭhihittvā yaścaṃkrame caṃkrami bodhisattvaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:744: sa paśyati buddhasahasrakoṭiyastaduttare yāttika gaṅgavālukāḥ // SRS_4.10
T02bsu034_u:745: unmādu gaccheya narasya cittaṃ yo buddhadharmāṇa pramāṇu gṛhṇīyāt /
T02bsu034_u:747: naivāpramāṇasya pramāṇamasti acintiyā sarvaguṇehi nāyakāḥ // SRS_4.11 //
T02bsu034_u:748: na so 'sti sattvo daśasu diśāsu yo lokanāthena samaḥ kutottari /
T02bsu034_u:749: sarve hi sarvajñaguṇarupetamākāṅkṣatha lapsyatha buddhajñānam // SRS_4.12
T02bsu034_u:751: yasyātra ālambani cittu vartate samāhitaḥ socyati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_4.13
T02bsu034_u:752: asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃskṛtu jñātva vijño nimittasaṃjñāya vibhāvitāya /
T02bsu034_u:753: so ānimitte bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ prajānatī śūnyaka sarvadharmān //
T02bsu034_u:754: yo dharmakāye bhavati pratiṣṭhito abhāva jānāti sa sarvabhāvān /
T02bsu034_u:755: abhāvasaṃjñāya vibhāvitāya na rūpakāyena jinendra paśyati // SRS_4.15 //
T02bsu034_u:756: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahu ca vitarkayennaraḥ /
T02bsu034_u:757: tathā tathā bhavati tannimittacittastehi vitarkehi tanniśritehi //
T02bsu034_u:758: evaṃ munīndraṃ smarato narasya ākārato jñānato aprameyataḥ /
T02bsu034_u:759: anusmṛtiṃ bhāvayataḥ sadā ca tannimnacittaṃ bhavatī tatproṇam // SRS_4.17
T02bsu034_u:760: sa caṃkramastho na niṣadyamāśrita ākāṅkṣate puruṣavarasya jñānam /
T02bsu034_u:761: ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ praṇigheti bodhaye bhaviṣyahaṃ loki niruttaro jinaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:763: sa buddha saṃjānati buddha paśyate buddhāna co dharmata pratyavekṣate /
T02bsu034_u:764: iha samādhismi pratiṣṭhihitvā namasyate buddha mahānubhāvān // SRS_4.19 //
T02bsu034_u:765: kāyena vācā ca prasanna mānasā buddhāna varṇaṃ bhaṇatī abhīkṣṇam /
T02bsu034_u:768: yadāpi so bhoti gilāna āturaḥ pravartate vedana māraṇāntikā /
T02bsu034_u:769: na buddhamārabhya smṛtiḥ pramuṣyate na vedanābhiranusaṃharīyati //
T02bsu034_u:770: tathā hi tena vicinitva jñātā anāgatā āgata dharmaśūnyatā /
T02bsu034_u:771: so tādṛśe dharmanaye pratiṣṭhito na khidyate citta carantu cārikām //
T02bsu034_u:772: tasmācchruṇitvā imu ānuśaṃsā janetha chandamatulāya bodhaye /

T02bsu034_u:774: ahaṃ ca bhāṣeya praṇīta dharmaṃ yūyaṃ ca śrutvāna samācarethāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:775: bhaiṣajya vastrāṃ ca gṛhītva āturo 'panetu vyādhiṃ na prabhoti ātmanaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:776: tasmādvidhijñena vicakṣaṇena imaṃ samādhiṃ pratikāṅkṣatā sadā /
T02bsu034_u:777: śīlaṃ śrutaṃ tyāgu niṣevitavyaṃ na durlabho eṣa samādhi bheṣyati //
T02bsu034_u:781: tatra bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule 'prameye
T02bsu034_u:782: 'cintye 'parimāṇe yadāsīt tena kālena tena samayena bhagavān ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca
T02bsu034_u:784: tena kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aśītiḥ śrāvakakoṭyaḥ prathamasannipāto 'bhūt sarveṣāmarhatām |
T02bsu034_u:788: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇamabhūt
T02bsu034_u:789: ayaṃ ca jambudvīpa ṛddhaḥ sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ramaṇīyaśca bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyaścābhūt
T02bsu034_u:790: tena khalu punaḥ samayena asmin jambudvīpe dvau rājānāvabhūtām |
T02bsu034_u:793: paribhuṅkte, dvitīyo 'pyardhaṃ paribhuṅkte ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyaṃ ca || tena kālena tena
T02bsu034_u:794: samayena rājño mahābalasya vijite bhagavān ghoṣadattastathāgato 'rhan
T02bsu034_u:796: iti hi kumāra rājñā mahābalena sa ghoṣadattastathāgataḥ paripūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ nimantrito 'bhūt sārdhaṃ bodhisattvasaṃghena bhikṣusaṃghena ca kalpikena paribhogeṇānavadyena
T02bsu034_u:798: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasaṃghasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya cotsado lābhasatkāraśloko 'bhūt |
T02bsu034_u:799: śrāddhāśca brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sabodhisattvasaṃghasya cotsadaṃ lābhasatkāramakārṣuḥ |
T02bsu034_u:800: te ca śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya lābhasatkārāyodyuktā abhūvan lokāmiṣapūjāyai yaduta rājña eva ca mahābalasyānuśikṣamāṇarūpam iti hi kumāra tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasya etadabhūt - parihīyante bateme sattvāḥ śīlapoṣadhasamādānatastathāgatānāmupasaṃkramaṇatastathāgataparyupāsanato brahmacaryāvāsataḥ pravrajyopasaṃpannabhikṣubhāvataśca |
T02bsu034_u:802: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tadanantaraṃ
T02bsu034_u:804: ta ete satvā dṛṣṭadharmagurukāśca saṃparāyagurukāśca nātyantaniṣṭhāḥ kuśalamūlāya |
T02bsu034_u:807: (Vaidya 24) tatra kumāra katamā sāṃparāyikagurukatā? yaduta svargalokādhyālambanatā |
T02bsu034_u:816: yannavahameteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā tathā dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yadamī sattvā yathānuttarayā dharmapūjayā dharmapratipattyā ca tathāgataṃ pūjayeyuḥ ||
T02bsu034_u:817: atha khalu kumāra ghoṣadattastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ rājño mahābalasya teṣāṃ ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ saṃvejanābhiprāya imā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:818: dānapradānena anyonya sevatāṃ teṣānyamanyasmi na bhoti gauravam /
T02bsu034_u:819: nā tādṛśīṃ sevana varṇayanti buddhā vidū yeṣa prahīṇa vāsanā // SRS_5.1 //
T02bsu034_u:820: te tādṛśā bhonti narāḥ susevitā ye dharma deśenti hitāya prāṇinām /
T02bsu034_u:821: teṣānyamanyasmi abhedya prema yanmārakoṭībhiraśakyu bhinditum // SRS_5.2
T02bsu034_u:822: lokāmiṣeṇo nara sevatāṃ nṛṇāṃ sarveṣaṃ sāṃdṛṣṭika bhoti arthaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:823: nirāmiṣaṃ dharma niṣevatāṃ hi mahānta artho bhavatī narāṇām // SRS_5.3 //
T02bsu034_u:824: nirāmiṣaṃ cittu upasthapitvā nirāmiṣaṃ dharma prakāśayitvā /

T02bsu034_u:826: na jātu kāmān pratisevamānaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇām /
T02bsu034_u:827: gṛhaṃ ca sevantu jugupsanīyamanuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim // SRS_5.5
T02bsu034_u:828: ye kāma varjenti yathāgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu jahitva tṛṣṇām /
T02bsu034_u:830: uttrastu gehādabhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣviyamagrabodhiḥ // SRS_5.6 //
T02bsu034_u:831: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇa āsī anāgate bheṣyati vāvatiṣṭhate /
T02bsu034_u:832: yehi sthitairevamagāramadhye prāptā iyamuttama agrabodhiḥ // SRS_5.7 //
T02bsu034_u:833: prahāya rājyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vaseta raṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:834: kleśān prahāya pratihatya māraṃ buddhyanti bodhiṃ virajāmasaṃskṛtām //
T02bsu034_u:835: yo buddhavīrān yatha gaṅgavālukā upasthiheyyā bahukalpakoṭiyaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:836: yaśco gṛhātaḥ parikhinnamānaso 'bhiniṣkrameyyā ayu tatra uttamaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:837: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi /
T02bsu034_u:838: nopasthitā bhonti narottamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā cariyāṇa dharmam //
T02bsu034_u:839: yaścaiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ sattvārtha nirviṇṇu kusaṃskṛtātaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:840: raṇyāmukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrame ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti //
T02bsu034_u:841: aśrauṣīt khalu punaḥ kumāra rājā mahābalo bhagavatā ghoṣadattena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena imāmevaṃrūpāṃ pravartitāṃ naiṣkramyapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathām |
T02bsu034_u:842: śrutvā ca vimṛśati - yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, na bhagavān dānapāramitāṃ varṇayati, na śīlapāramitāṃ varṇayati |
T02bsu034_u:851: yannvahaṃ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajeyam |
T02bsu034_u:852: iti hi (Vaidya 26) kumāra rājā mahābalaḥ sārdhamaśītyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bhagavān ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T02bsu034_u:854: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'sthāt |
T02bsu034_u:855: atha khalu kumāra bhagavān ghoṣadatto rājño mahābalasya adhyāśayaṃ viditvā imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ deśayate |
T02bsu034_u:856: atha khalu kumāra rājā mahābala imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ keśaśmaśraṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajito 'bhūt |
T02bsu034_u:858: udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayiotvā bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt |
T02bsu034_u:859: sa tenaiva kuśalamūlena daśakalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagamat, viṃśatiṃ ca buddhakoṭīrārāgayāmāsa
T02bsu034_u:861: śrutvā tebhyo buddhebhyastenodgṛhītaḥ paryavāpto dhārito vācito bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt
T02bsu034_u:862: sa tataḥ paścāt tenaiva kuśalamūlena daśānāṃ kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena paripūrṇena kalpaśatasahasreṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho 'bhūt |
T02bsu034_u:863: so 'prameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā paścād buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvṛto 'bhūt |
T02bsu034_u:864: tatra kumāra yānyaśītiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājñā mahābalena sārdhaṃ bhagavantaṃ ghoṣadattaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkrāntāni, te 'pi sarve imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitā abhūvan |
T02bsu034_u:865: te 'pi tathā pravrajitā imaṃ samādhimudgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyuktā vihṛtya tenaiva kuśalamūlena viṃśatikalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagaman |
T02bsu034_u:867: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantike imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvodgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyuktā vihṛtya tenaiva pūrvakreṇa kuśalamūlena viṃśatīnāṃ kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena tataḥ paścāt paripūrṇadaśabhiḥ kalpasahasrairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā dṛḍhaśūranāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpannā abhuvan |
T02bsu034_u:868: te 'pyaprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān paripācya teṣāṃ cārthaṃ kṛtvā buddhaparinirvṛtā abhūvan
T02bsu034_u:869: tadanenāpi te kumāra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ yathāyaṃ samādhirbahukaro bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarasya sarvajñajñānasyāharaṇāya saṃvartata iti || atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya tasyāṃ velāyāmetadeva pūrvayogaparivartaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena vistareṇa
T02bsu034_u:871: smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatītamadhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇa uttamaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:876: sarve ca kṣīṇāsrava niṣkileśāḥ sarve ca ṛddhībalapāramiṃ gatāḥ /

T02bsu034_u:878: abhiṣekaprāptā parahita aprameyā vaśitehi bhūmihi ca supratiṣṭhitāḥ /

T02bsu034_u:914: mahākaruṇāsaṃprasthitena cittena tiṣṭhatāṃ vā tathāgatānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ vā pūjākarmaṇe udyukto bhavati, yaduta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhistūryatālāvacarairvaijayantībhiḥ tacca kuśalamūlaṃ samādhipratilambhāya pariṇamayati |
T02bsu034_u:915: sa na kaṃciddharmamākāṅkṣaṃstathāgataṃ pūjayati na rūpaṃ na kāmān na bhogān na svargān na parivārān |
T02bsu034_u:917: sa ākāṅkṣan dharmakāyato 'pi tathāgataṃ nopalabhate, kimaṅga punā rūpakāyata
T02bsu034_u:919: tasmāttarhi kumāra eṣāṃ sā tathāgatānā pūjā yaduta tathāgatasyādarśanamātmanaścānupalabdhiḥ karmavipākasya cāpratikāṅkṣamāṇatā |
T02bsu034_u:920: anayā kumāra trimaṇḍalapariśuddhayā pūjayā tathāgataṃ pūjayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate ||
T02bsu034_u:921: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya etadeva samādhiparikarmanirdeśaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśamati sma -
T02bsu034_u:922: anantajñānasya daditva gandhān anantagandho bhavatī narāṇām /

T02bsu034_u:926: sacet punarjānati vāsti sattvo yo gandha detī tatha yasya dīyate /

T02bsu034_u:929: tasyaitaṃ kṣāntimadhimātra sevataḥ sacennaraḥ kākaṇicchedyu chidyate /

T02bsu034_u:933: kṣāntyasmi dharme prakṛtau nirātmake nairātmyasaṃjñasya kileśu nāsti /

T02bsu034_u:946: jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyakaṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi /

T02bsu034_u:948: yathā hi putra puruṣasya jātu kṛtaṃsi nāmā ayameva nāma /

T02bsu034_u:985: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi kumāra yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvastrikṣāntiviśeṣakuśalo bhavati

T02bsu034_u:990: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ceti ||
T02bsu034_u:991: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ trikṣāntyavatāraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -

T02bsu034_u:1002: yāsmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthatāṃ jānati sarvadharmān //
T02bsu034_u:1003: ye asmi loke pṛthu anyatīrthā na tasya teṣu pratihanyate manaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1018: sa tādṛśaṃ śānta samādhimeṣate samāhitasya na sa asti sattvaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1020: ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste buddhajñānena bhaṇeyu dharmān /

T02bsu034_u:1022: purimottarā dakṣiṇapaścimāsu heṣṭhe tathordhvaṃ vidiśāsu caiva /

T02bsu034_u:1028: buddhāna ācāru tathaiva gocarā īryāpatho yādṛśa nāyakānām /

T02bsu034_u:1089: tasya ca bhagavato bodhiprāptasya sarvavṛkṣapatrebhyaḥ sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatibhyaḥ sarvaśailaśikharebhyaścābhāvasamudgataśabdo niścarati |

T02bsu034_u:1112: sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarveṣa dharmāṇa abhāvu deśayī /

T02bsu034_u:1120: tasmiṃśca kāle abhu rājaputraḥ karuṇāvicintī sada nāmadheyaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1123: vanditva pādau munipuṃgavasya pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtya ca gauraveṇa /

T02bsu034_u:1125: sa co jino āśayu jñātva dhīraḥ prakāśayāmāsa samādhimetam /

T02bsu034_u:1214: tathāgatasyo yatha nirvṛtasya manasi karontaḥ pratibimbu dṛśyate /
T02bsu034_u:1215: yathaiva taṃ pūrvu tathaiva paścāt tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //

T02bsu034_u:1218: deve yathā varṣati sthūlabinduke pṛthak pṛthag budbuda saṃbhavanti /

T02bsu034_u:1221: na lekhasaṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //

T02bsu034_u:1229: yathaiva gandharvapuraṃ marīcikā yathaiva māyā supinaṃ yathaiva /

T02bsu034_u:1231: yathaiva candrasya nabhe viśuddhe hrade prasanne pratibimba dṛśyate /
T02bsu034_u:1232: śaśisya saṃkrānti jale na vidyate tallakṣaṇān jānatha sarvadharmān //
T02bsu034_u:1233: yathā naraḥ śailavanāntare sthito bhaṇeyya gāyeyya haseyya rodaye /

T02bsu034_u:1237: yathaiva kāmān supinanta seviya pratibuddhasattvaḥ puruṣo na paśyati /

T02bsu034_u:1239: rūpān yathā nirmiṇi māyakāro hastīrathānaśvarathān vicitrān /

T02bsu034_u:1246: yathaiva rātrau jala candra dṛśyate acchasmi vārismi anāvilasmi /

T02bsu034_u:1248: yathaiva grīṣmāṇa madhyāhnakāle tṛṣābhitaptaḥ puruṣo vrajeta /

T02bsu034_u:1257: yasmādime indriya apramāṇā jaḍāḥ svabhāvena avyākṛtāśva /

T02bsu034_u:1259: pūrvāntu kāyasya avekṣamāṇo naivātra kāyo napi kāyasaṃjñā /
T02bsu034_u:1260: na yatra kāyo napi kāyasaṃjñā asaṃskṛtaṃ gotramidaṃ pravucyati // SRS_9.25
T02bsu034_u:1261: nivṛtti dharmāṇa na asti dharmā yeneti nāsti na te jātu asti /
T02bsu034_u:1262: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati // SRS_9.26
T02bsu034_u:1263: astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /

T02bsu034_u:1265: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣa śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1267: smṛterupasthānakathāṃ kathitvā manyanti bālā vaya kāyasākṣī /

T02bsu034_u:1269: caturṣu dhyāneṣu kathāṃ kathitvā vadanti bālā vayaṃ dhyānagocarāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1270: na kleśadhyāyi na ca asti manyanā viditva jñānena madaḥ prahīyate //
T02bsu034_u:1271: caturṣu sattveṣu kathāṃ kathitvā vadanti bālā vaya satyadarśinaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1273: na satyadarśisya ca kāci manyanā amanyanā satya jinena deśitā // SRS_9.31
T02bsu034_u:1274: rakṣeta śīlaṃ na ca tena manye śruṇeyya dharmaṃ na ca tena manye /
T02bsu034_u:1275: yanaiva so manyati alpaprajño tanmūlakaṃ duḥkha vivardhate 'sya //
T02bsu034_u:1276: duḥkhasya mūlaṃ madu saṃnidarśitaṃ sarvajñinā lokavināyakena /
T02bsu034_u:1277: madena mattāna duḥkhaṃ pravardhate amanyamānāna dukhaṃ nirudhyate //
T02bsu034_u:1278: kiyadbahūn dharma paryāpuṇeyyā śīlaṃ na rakṣeta śrutena mattaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1279: na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu tāyituṃ duḥśīla yena vrajamāna durgatim //
T02bsu034_u:1280: sacet punaḥ śīlamadena matto na bāhuśrutyasmi karoti yogam /
T02bsu034_u:1281: kṣayetva so śīlaphalamaśeṣaṃ puno 'pi sa pratyanubhoti duḥkham // SRS_9.35
T02bsu034_u:1282: kiṃcāpi bhāveyya samādhi loke na co vibhāveyya sa ātmasaṃjñām /
T02bsu034_u:1283: punaḥ prakupyanti kileśu tasya yathodrakasyeha samādhibhāvanā // SRS_9.36
T02bsu034_u:1284: nairātmyadharmān yadi pratyavekṣate tān pratyavekṣya yadi bhāvayeta /
T02bsu034_u:1285: sa hetu nirvāṇaphalasya prāptaye yo anyaheturna sa bhoti śāntaye //
T02bsu034_u:1287: na tasya pādāḥ prabhavanti gacchituṃ gṛhītva caurehi sa tatra hanyate //
T02bsu034_u:1289: evaṃ naraḥ śīlavihīna mūḍhaḥ palāyitumicchati saṃskṛtātaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1290: sa śīlahīno na prabhoti gacchituṃ jarāya vyādhyā maraṇena hanyate //
T02bsu034_u:1291: yathaiva caurāṇa bahū sahasro nānāmukhehi prakaroti pāpam /
T02bsu034_u:1292: evaṃ kileśā vividhairmukhebhiryathaiva cauro hani śuklapākṣam // SRS_9.40
T02bsu034_u:1293: yena sunidhyāptu nirātmaskandhā ākruṣṭhu paribhāṣṭu na śaṅku bhoti /
T02bsu034_u:1294: sa kleśamārasya vaśaṃ na gacchate yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so na kupyate //
T02bsu034_u:1295: bahū jano bhāṣati skandhaśūnyatāṃ na ca prajānāti yathā nirātmakāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1296: te aprajānanta parehi coditāḥ krodhābhibhūtāḥ paruṣaṃ vadanti // SRS_9.42
T02bsu034_u:1297: yathā naro āturu kāyaduḥkhito bahūhi varṣehi na jātu mucyate /
T02bsu034_u:1298: sa dīrghagailānyadukhena pīḍitaḥ paryeṣate vaidyu cikitsanārthikaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1299: punaḥ punastena gaveṣatā ca āsādito vaidya vidū vicakṣaṇaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1300: kāruṇyatāṃ tena upasthapetvā prayuktu bhaiṣajyamidaṃ niṣevyatām //
T02bsu034_u:1301: gṛhītva bhaiṣajya pṛthuṃ varāṃ varāṃ na sevate āturu yena mucyate /
T02bsu034_u:1302: na vaidyadoṣo na ca bhaiṣajānāṃ tasyaiva doṣo bhavi āturasya // SRS_9.45
T02bsu034_u:1303: evamiha śāsani pravrajitvā paryāpuṇitvā bala dhyāna indriyān /
T02bsu034_u:1304: na bhāvanāyāmabhiyukta bhonti ayuktayogīna kuto 'sti nirvṛtiḥ // SRS_9.46
T02bsu034_u:1306: svabhāvaśūnyāḥ sada sarvadharmā vastuṃ vibhāventi jināna putrāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1307: sarveṇa sarvaṃ bhava sarvaśūnyaṃ prādeśikī śūnyatā tīrthikānām // SRS_9.47
T02bsu034_u:1308: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti /
T02bsu034_u:1309: mamāntike enti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karoti saṃstavam // SRS_9.48
T02bsu034_u:1310: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
T02bsu034_u:1311: kiyacciraṃ bālu susevito 'pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasaṃnibhāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1312: na vijña bāleṣviha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvadharmatām /
T02bsu034_u:1313: svabhāvabhinna prakṛtīya bālā na cāsti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānām // SRS_9.50
T02bsu034_u:1314: sahadharmikeno vacanena uktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca /
T02bsu034_u:1315: prāviṣkaronti imi bāladharmān imamarthu vijñāya na viśvasanti // SRS_9.51
T02bsu034_u:1316: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathā amedhyena amedhyu sārdham /
T02bsu034_u:1317: vijñāḥ punarvijñajanena sārdhaṃ samenti sarpiryatha sarpimaṇḍaiḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1319: buddhāna co vākyamaśraddadhānāste cchedyabhedyasmi caranti bālāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1320: sudurlabhaṃ labhya manuṣyalābhaṃ na śilpasthāneṣu bhavanti kovidāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1322: daridrabhūtāna dhanaṃ na vidyate ajīvamānāstada pravrajanti // SRS_9.54 //
T02bsu034_u:1323: te pravrajitvā iha buddhaśāsane adhyuṣitā bhontiha pātracīvare /
T02bsu034_u:1324: te pāpamitrehi parigṛhītāstāṃ nācarante sugatāna śikṣām // SRS_9.55 //
T02bsu034_u:1325: te ātmanaḥ śīlamapaśyamānāścittavyavasthāṃ na labhanti bālāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1326: rātriṃdivaṃ bhonti ayuktayogā na te jugupsanti ca pāpakarmataḥ // SRS_9.56
T02bsu034_u:1327: kāyena cittena asaṃyatānāṃ na kiṃci vācāya sa jalpitavyam /
T02bsu034_u:1328: sadā gaveṣanti parasya doṣān aparāddhu kiṃ kena vā codayiṣye // SRS_9.57
T02bsu034_u:1329: āhāri adhyuṣita bhonti bālā na cāsti mātrajñatu bhojanasmin /
T02bsu034_u:1330: buddhasya puṇyehi labhitva bhojanaṃ tasyaiva bālā akṛtajña bhonti //
T02bsu034_u:1331: te bhojanaṃ svādurasaṃ praṇītaṃ labdhvā ca bhuñjanti ayuktayogāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1332: teṣāṃ sa āhāru vadhāya bhoti yatha hastipotāna bisā adhautakāḥ // SRS_9.59
T02bsu034_u:1333: kiṃ cāpi vidvān matimān vicakṣaṇo bhuñjīta āhāru śuci praṇītam /
T02bsu034_u:1334: na caiva adhyuṣita tatra bhoti agṛghnu so bhuñjati yuktayogī // SRS_9.60
T02bsu034_u:1335: kiṃ cāpi vidvān matimān vicakṣaṇo ābhāṣate bālu kuto hi svāgatam /
T02bsu034_u:1337: tatha saṃgṛhītvā priyavadyatāya kāruṇyatāṃ tatra upasthapeti // SRS_9.61
T02bsu034_u:1338: yo bhoti bālāna hitānukampī tasyaiva bālā vyasanena tuṣṭāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1339: etena doṣeṇa jahitva bālān mṛgovadeko viharedaraṇye // SRS_9.62 //
T02bsu034_u:1340: ima īdṛśān doṣa viditva paṇḍito na jātu bālehi karoti saṃgatim /
T02bsu034_u:1341: vihīnaprajñānupasevato me svargāttu hāniḥ kuta bodhi lapsye // SRS_9.63 //
T02bsu034_u:1342: maitrīvihārī ca bhavanti paṇḍitāḥ karuṇāvihārī muditāvihārī /
T02bsu034_u:1343: upekṣakāḥ sarvabhaveṣu nityaṃ samādhi bhāvetva spṛśanti bodhim // SRS_9.64
T02bsu034_u:1344: te bodhi buddhitva śivāmaśokāṃ viditva sattvān janavyādhipīḍitān /
T02bsu034_u:1345: kāruṇyatāṃ tatra upasthapetvā kathāṃ kathenti paramārthayuktām // SRS_9.65
T02bsu034_u:1346: ye tāṃ vijānanti jināna dharmatāmanābhilapyaṃ sugatāna satyam /
T02bsu034_u:1347: te dharma śrutvā ima evarūpāṃ lapsyanti kṣānti ariyāṃ nirāmiṣām //
T02bsu034_u:1351: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma -
T02bsu034_u:1352: tasmāttarhi kumāra pratipattisāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam |
T02bsu034_u:1353: tat kasya hetoḥ? pratipattisārasya hi kumāra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ, kiṃ punarayaṃ samādhiḥ |
T02bsu034_u:1354: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -
T02bsu034_u:1355: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat subhāṣitā ceyaṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmavavādānuśāsanī sarvabodhisattvaśikṣā deśitā svākhyātā suprajñaptā |
T02bsu034_u:1358: pratipattisārāśca vayaṃ bhagavan bhaviṣyāmaḥ anapekṣāḥ kāyajīvite ca bhūtvā tathāgatasyānu śikṣiṣyāmahe |
T02bsu034_u:1359: tat kasya hetoḥ? śikḥitukāmāśca vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatasya, abhisaṃboddhukāmā vayaṃ bhagavannanuttarāṃ
T02bsu034_u:1363: mocayitukāmā vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvān sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:1364: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvastane mama gṛhe bhaktaṃ bhoktuṃ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvagaṇena sārdhaṃ bhikḥusaṃghena cānukampāmupādāya |
T02bsu034_u:1365: adhivāsayati sma bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya tūḥṇīṃbhāvena śvastane gṛhe bhaktaṃ bhoktuṃ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvagaṇena bhikḥusaṃghena cānukampāmupādāya
T02bsu034_u:1366: | atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavatastūḥṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanaṃ viditvā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakḥiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikāt
T02bsu034_u:1368: atha khalu candaprabhaḥ kumārabhūto yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ yena ca svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasamakrāmat
T02bsu034_u:1370: praviśya ca tāmeva rātriṃ prabhūtaṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ svādanīyamabhisaṃskārayati sma |
T02bsu034_u:1371: śatarasaṃ ca bhojanaṃ saṃpādya tasyā eva rātryā atyayena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ susiktaṃ susaṃmṛṣṭaṃ muktakusumābhikīrṇaṃ gandhaghaṭikānirghūpitamucchritacchatradhvajapatākaṃ (Vaidya 55) dhūpanadhūpitaṃ vitānavitatamavasaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṃ sarathyāntarāpaṇamapagatapāṣāṇaḥarkarakaṭhallaṃ vicitrapuṣpābhikīrṇaṃ candanacūrṇābhikīrṇaṃ gavākṣatoraṇaniryūhapañjarajālārdhacandrasamalaṃkṛtaṃ candanānuliptamakārṣīt sarvāvantaṃ nagaramutpalakumudapadmapuṇḍarīkābhyavakīrṇamakārṣīt |
T02bsu034_u:1373: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta imānevaṃrupān nagaravyūhān gṛhavyūhān bhojanavyūhān samalaṃkṛtya rājagṛhānmahānagarānniṣkramya yena gṛdhrakūṭaparvato yena bhagavāṃstenopasamakrāmat |
T02bsu034_u:1375: ekānte sthitaḥ candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavataḥ kālamārocayāmāsa - kālo bhagavan, kālaḥ sugata, siddhaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ
T02bsu034_u:1377: atha khalu bhagavān utthāyāsanāt kalyameva nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena bhikṣuśatasahasreṇa saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'nekaiśca
T02bsu034_u:1378: devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaśatasahasraiḥ pūjyamāno 'bhiṣṭūyamāno mahatā buddhānubhāvena mahatā buddhaprātihāryeṇa mahatā buddheryāpathena
T02bsu034_u:1379: raśmikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrairniścaradbhirnānātūryaśatasahasraiḥ puṣpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaraiḥ pravarṣadbhiryena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma |
T02bsu034_u:1380: candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya niveśane prakṣiptaśca bhagavatā dakṣiṇaścakraratnasamalaṃkṛtaḥ aparimitakuśalasaṃcitapādaratna indrakīle, atha tāvadeva tasmin mahānagare anekāni āścaryādbhutāni prātihāryāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma |
T02bsu034_u:1383: puravara praviśanti nāyakasmin caraṇavaru sthapitaśca indrakīle /
T02bsu034_u:1384: calati vasumatī śirīya tasya pramudita bhonti purottamasmi sattvāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1385: ye naraḥ kṣudhitāḥ pipāsitā vā na bhavati teṣa jighatsa tasmi kāle /
T02bsu034_u:1386: apagata bhavatī kṣughā pipāsā yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam //
T02bsu034_u:1387: tatha puna nara ye bhavanti andhāḥ śrotravihīna anātha alpapuṇyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1388: sarvi pratilabhanti cakṣu śrotraṃ yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam //
T02bsu034_u:1389: yamaviṣaye ye keci bhonti pretāḥ suduḥkhita kheṭasiṃghāṇakabhojanāśāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1390: sarvi sukhita bhonti ābhaspṛṣṭā yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam //
T02bsu034_u:1393: sarvi abhinamanti yena buddho yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam //
T02bsu034_u:1394: sanagaranigamā sasāgarāntā pracali vasuṃdhari ṣaḍvikāra sarvā /
T02bsu034_u:1395: na bhavati viheṭha kasyapi ceha yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam //
T02bsu034_u:1397: chatra dhariya ca lokanāyakasya paramaprīṇita janetva bodhichandam //
T02bsu034_u:1398: śrūyati ca manojña vādyaśabdastūryasahasra aghaṭṭitā raṇanti /
T02bsu034_u:1399: pramuditāstada bhonti sarvasattvā yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam //
T02bsu034_u:1400: vṛkṣaśatasahasra onamanti sarvi prapuṣpita bhonti tasmi kāle /
T02bsu034_u:1401: devaśatasahasra antarīkṣe pūja karonti amānuṣī jinasya // SRS_10.9 //
T02bsu034_u:1402: ṛṣabhagaṇa tadā nadanti hṛṣṭā hayadviradādhipatī pravṛddhakāyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1403: mṛgapatayo nadanti siṃhanādaṃ yada jinu nikṣipatīndrakīli pādam //
T02bsu034_u:1404: mahīpataya ye keci bhūmipālā diśividiśāsu ca āgatā bhavanti /
T02bsu034_u:1405: dharaṇitali patanti hṛṣṭacittā dṛṣṭu jinasya śirīmimamevarūpām //
T02bsu034_u:1406: anye abhiṣṭuvanti lokanātham apari kṣipanti jinasya puṣpavṛṣṭim /
T02bsu034_u:1408: apari daśanakhāñjaliṃ karitvā aho jinu kāruṇiko bhaṇanti vācam //
T02bsu034_u:1409: keci vara kṣipanti muktahārān bahuvidha ābharaṇān janetva prītim /
T02bsu034_u:1410: cīvara ratanān kṣipanti anye atuliyu agru jinatva bodhicittam // SRS_10.13
T02bsu034_u:1411: keci vara kṣipanti hemajālaṃ apari punarmukhaphullakaṃ kṣipanti /
T02bsu034_u:1412: keci vara kṣipanti hemaniṣkāṃstatha apare parihārakān kṣipanti //
T02bsu034_u:1413: kaṭakavara kṣipanti keci tatra apari keyūra kṣipanti ratnacitrān /
T02bsu034_u:1414: ambara kusumān kṣipanti anye citta janetva 'siyāṃ vayaṃ pi buddhāḥ' //
T02bsu034_u:1415: apari naraḥ kṣipanti hemacitrāṃstatha maṇisūtravarān prasannacittāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1416: keci ca ratanajālakaṃ kṣipanti dvāri yadā sthitu bhoti lokanāthaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1417: paramaduḥkhita ye bhavanti sattvā bahuvidhupadruvu śokaśalya prāptāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1418: sarvi sukhasamarpitā bhavanti puruṣavarasya śirīya nāyakasya // SRS_10.17
T02bsu034_u:1420: sarvi dvijagaṇā nabhe sthihitvā paramamanojñarutāni vyāharanti //
T02bsu034_u:1421: pramudita tada bhonti pakṣisaṃghā madhuramanojñarutaṃ pramuñcamānāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1422: rāgu tatha samenti doṣamohaṃ ye ca śṛṇanti manojña pakṣiśabdān //
T02bsu034_u:1424: śruṇiya rañjanīya sattvakoṭyaḥ sarvi ca labhanti kṣāntimānulomām /
T02bsu034_u:1425: tāṃśca sugata vyākaroti sarvān bhaviṣyatha yūya jinā anāgatāśca //
T02bsu034_u:1426: na bhavati kileśu tasmi kāle sarvi sagaurava bhonti dharmarāje /
T02bsu034_u:1428: paśyiya tada rūpa nāyakasya spṛha janayanti varasmi buddhajñāne /
T02bsu034_u:1429: kada vaya labhe jñānamevarūpam āśayu jñātva jino 'sya vyākaroti //
T02bsu034_u:1430: raśmi śatasahasra niścaranti ekaikataḥ sugatasya romakūpāt /
T02bsu034_u:1431: taduttari yatha gaṅgavālikā vā na pi ca nimittu gṛhītu śakyu tāsām //
T02bsu034_u:1432: sūryaprabha na bhāntiṃ tasmi kāle na pi maṇi nāgni na sarvadevatānām /
T02bsu034_u:1433: sarvi prabha na bhānti tasmi kāle yada praviśanta puraṃ vibhāti buddhaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1435: yatra daśabalaḥ sthapeti pādaṃ mārga gataḥ sugato mahāgaṇena // SRS_10.25
T02bsu034_u:1436: aśuci kalimalā na bhonti tasmi kāle nagaravaraṃ praviśanti nāyakasmin /
T02bsu034_u:1437: nagaru surabhi sarvi dhūpanena gandha manojña pravāyate samantāt //
T02bsu034_u:1438: vīthi nagari tada bhoti sarvā apagataloṣṭakaṭhalla sikta gandhaiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1440: puṇya daśalabasya evarūpā vividha vikīrṇa bhavanti muktapuṣpāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1441: yakṣa śatasahasra raudracittāḥ kanakanibhaṃ dvipadendru dṛṣṭva buddham /
T02bsu034_u:1442: janayi vipulu nāyakasmi premaṃ śaraṇamupeti ca buddhadharmasaṃghān //

T02bsu034_u:1457: pratapati sthitu rājamārgi buddhaścandro nabhaḥstha yathaiva pūrṇimāsyām
T02bsu034_u:1458: maṇiratanu yathā viśuddhu śreṣṭhaṃ vyapagatadoṣamalaṃ prabhāsamānam /
T02bsu034_u:1459: diśi vidiśi pramuñci ābha śuddhāṃ tatha jinu bhāsati sarvalokadhātum //
T02bsu034_u:1460: parivṛtu jinu devadānavehi praviśati rājagṛhaṃ narāṇa śreṣṭhaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1461: dharaṇi kramatalehi citrayanto praviśati candraprabhasya gehi buddhaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1462: puruvaru samalaṃkṛtaṃ samantād bahu dhvaja koṭisahasra ucchitātra /
T02bsu034_u:1464: yada sugatu kathāṃ katheti nātho vīthigato manujān kṛpāyamānaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1466: daśaniyuta jināna nirmitāna kanakanibhā abhirūpa darśanīyā /
T02bsu034_u:1467: parivṛtu jinu buddhu nirmitehi vitarati śūnyata śānta buddhabodhim //
T02bsu034_u:1468: prāṇiśatasahasra taṃ śruṇitvā praṇidadhi cittu varāgrabuddhajñāne /
T02bsu034_u:1469: kada vaya labhi jñānamevarūpaṃ āśayu jñātva jino 'sya vyākaroti //
T02bsu034_u:1470: keci spṛha janenti tatra kāle parama acintiya labdha tehi lābhāḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1473: keci punarupapādayi sucittaṃ śvo vaya kāruṇikaṃ nimantrayāmaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1474: hitakaramanukampakaṃ prajānāṃ yasya sudurlabhu darśanaṃ bhaveṣu //
T02bsu034_u:1475: keci sthita niryūhakhoṭake hi subhagu vibhūṣitagātra premaṇīyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1477: surucira vara campakasya mālāṃ tatha atimuktaka gandhavarṣikāṃ ca /

T02bsu034_u:1479: keci sthita gṛhe gṛhītapuṣpāḥ paramavibhūṣitakāyu cīvarehi /
T02bsu034_u:1480: puṣpa vividhu gṛhītva paṭṭadāmān pravarṣi yena jino mahānubhāvaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1481: padumakumudotpalān kṣipanti keci apari kṣipanti viśiṣṭa hemapuṣpān /
T02bsu034_u:1482: maṇiratana kṣipanti keci tasmin apari kṣipanti ca cūrṇa candanasya //
T02bsu034_u:1483: aparimita bhavanti accharīyā atuliya ye na ca śakyu kīrtanāya /

T02bsu034_u:1485: abṛha atapāśca dṛṣṭasattyāḥ sudṛśa sudarśana ye ca anya devāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1486: tatha punarakaniṣṭha vītarāgā upagata sarvi narendradarśanāya // SRS_10.49
T02bsu034_u:1488: tatha śubhamarutāśca aprameyā aparimita śubhā udagracittāḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1490: aparimitu tathāpramāṇaābhā tatha puna deva parītta ābha ye ca /

T02bsu034_u:1496: tridaśa apu ca śakra devarājā apsarakoṭiśataiḥ sahāgato 'tra /

T02bsu034_u:1499: virūḍhaku virūpākṣu hṛṣṭacittā upagata sarvi narendra te stuvantā //
T02bsu034_u:1500: ailavila balavanta yakṣarājā parivṛta yakṣaśatehi premajātaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1505: bahava śata karoṭapāṇi yakṣā api ca subhūṣi teṣa yakṣakanyāḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1509: śaṃbara bala vemacitra rāhu dānavakanya sahasrapārivārāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1510: asuragaṇa maharddhikāśca anye upagata te ratanāni varṣamāṇāḥ // SRS_10.60
T02bsu034_u:1512: pṛthu vividha vicitra muktapuṣpān puruṣavarasya kṣipanti gauraveṇa ||61 ||
T02bsu034_u:1513: tathapi ca anavataptu nāgarājā paramasuśikṣitāśca nāgakanyāḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1515: pañcaśata anavataptu putrā vipulu anuttaru jñāna prārthayantaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1516: svajanaparivṛtā udagra bhūtvā upagata pūjayituṃ svayaṃ svayaṃbhūm //
T02bsu034_u:1517: tathapi ca apalālu nāgarājā puruṣavarasya kṛtāñjaliḥ praṇamya /
T02bsu034_u:1519: vara rucira gṛhītva nāgapuṣpān sthita gagane munirāja satkarontaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:1520: tathapi ca mucilinda nāgarājā prītamanāḥ parituṣṭa harṣajātaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1522: tathapi ca kāliko 'pi nāgarājā upagatu mukhu tathāgatasya hṛṣṭacittaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1523: vara rūcira gṛhītva ratnadāmān puruṣavarasya pūja karitva śreṣṭhām //
T02bsu034_u:1524: so 'pi parama gauravaṃ janitvā anusmaramāṇu guṇāṃstathāgatasya /

T02bsu034_u:1526: nandu tathā upanandu nāgarājā tatha punastakṣaka kṛṣṇagautamau ca /

T02bsu034_u:1528: upagata elapatru nāgarājā parivṛta nāgaśatehi rocamānaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1532: kṣipra ahu jahitva nāgayoniṃ parama jugupsitametu jantukāyam /

T02bsu034_u:1537: kṣipta śila jinasya tatra yeno gaganasthitena gṛhītva tasmi kāle /
T02bsu034_u:1538: rājagṛhi sa kimpilo 'pi yakṣaḥ purataḥ sthitaḥ sugatasya gauraveṇa //
T02bsu034_u:1539: alakavatī samagra rājadhānī śūnya abhūṣi na tatra kaści yakṣaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1543: indraketu vikaṭaśca surūpo vakkulu pañciku śākya pravṛddho /

T02bsu034_u:1548: jalanidhi nivasanti ye suparṇā upagata brāhmaṇaveśa nirmiṇitvā /

T02bsu034_u:1554: aṭavimaruṣu devatāśatāni giriśikhareṣu ya devatā samagrāḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1568: raśmi śatasahasra aprameyā avakiri pādatalehi dharmarājā /

T02bsu034_u:1570: dharma daśabala saṃprabhāṣi tatro marumanujāna viśuddha bhoti cakṣuḥ /

T02bsu034_u:1579: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya niviśanarathyāmavagāhamānaścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya niveśanaṃ praviṣṭo 'bhūt |
T02bsu034_u:1582: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvasaṃghaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca niṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā svayameva śatarasena bhojanena praṇītena prabhūtena khādanīyena bhojanīyena lehyena coṣyeṇa peyena bhagavantaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantamapanītadhautapāṇiṃ viditvā divyena navanavatikoṭīśatasahasramūlyena dūṣyayugena bhagavantamabhicchādayāmāsa |
T02bsu034_u:1583: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ bhikṣusaṃghasya ca pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ tricīvaramadātū ||
T02bsu034_u:1584: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅga kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhigītena praśnaṃ paripṛcchati sma -

T02bsu034_u:1589: sarveṣa sattvāna cariṃ prajānase sarveṣu dharmeṣu ti jñānu vartate /

T02bsu034_u:1591: svabhāva dharmāṇamabhāvu jānase anābhilapyāṃ gira saṃprabhāṣase /

T02bsu034_u:1594: sarveṣa sattvāna cariṃ prajānase sarveṣu dharmeṣu jñānānuvartate /

T02bsu034_u:1600: yat kiṃci dharmaṃ skhalitaṃ na te 'sti tato ti cittaṃ nikhilaṃ prahīṇam /

T02bsu034_u:1605: carīpraveśaṃ mama deśaya svayaṃ śrutvā ca sattvāna cariṃ prajāniyām //
T02bsu034_u:1607: pratyakṣa bhonti katha bodhisattvaḥ prakāśayasva mama buddhanetrīm //
T02bsu034_u:1608: sarveṣu dharmeṣviha pāramiṃgatāḥ sarveṣu nirdeśapadeṣu śikṣitāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:1611: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñātha candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate smaekadharmeṇa kumāra samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ etān guṇān
T02bsu034_u:1613: katamenaikena dharmeṇa iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ jānāti? iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmānanāmakān nāmāpagatān prajānāti |
T02bsu034_u:1614: ghoṣāpagatān vākpathāpagatān akṣarāpagatān utpādāpagatān nirodhāpagatān hetuvilakṣaṇān pratyayavilakṣaṇān vipākalakṣaṇānārambhaṇalakṣaṇān vivekalakṣaṇān ekalakṣaṇān yadutālakṣaṇān nimittāpagatān acintyāṃścintāpagatān manopagatān sarvadharmān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T02bsu034_u:1615: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -

T02bsu034_u:1638: yena te kalpakoṭīyaḥ saṃsaranti punaḥ punaḥ // SRS_11.23 //

T02bsu034_u:2179: lekhāna piṣyanti ayuktayogāḥ śīlaṃ tatheryāpathu chorayitvā /

T02bsu034_u:2181: ye karma buddhehi sadā vivarjitāstulamānakūṭe ca sadā prayuktāḥ /

T02bsu034_u:2188: mayā ca pūrve cariyāṃ caritvā suduṣkaraṃ kalpasahasra cīrṇam /

T02bsu034_u:2226: bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛto devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyanamaskṛtaḥ sāgaropamāyāṃ parṣadi dhama saṃdeśayati sma |
T02bsu034_u:2227: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantaṃ nirgataṃ viditvā aśītyā prāṇikoṭīśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvairdevabhūtairanyalokadhātvāgataiśca saṃbahulairbodhisattvamahāsattvaniyutaiḥ sārdhaṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanaṃ gṛhītvā tūryaśatairvādyamānaiśchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiratyucchritābhiḥ mahāmālyābhinirhāramādāya bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe yena gṛdhrakūṭaparvato
T02bsu034_u:2229: upetya ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanaistūryatālāvacaraiḥ pravādyamānairmahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ekānte nyaṣīdat sagauravaḥ sapratīśo dharmaparipṛcchāyai atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśaṃ sacenme bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya evamukte bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - pṛccha tvaṃ kumāra
T02bsu034_u:2232: evamukte candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - katibhirbhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate? evamukte bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - caturbhiḥ kumāra dharmaiḥ
T02bsu034_u:2233: samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate |
T02bsu034_u:2234: katamaiścaturbhiḥ? iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sūrato bhavati suvisaṃvāso dānto dāntabhūmimanuprāptaḥ
T02bsu034_u:2235: sa parairākruṣṭo vā paribhāṣito vā duruktānāṃ durbhāṣitānāṃ vacanapathānāṃ kṣamo bhavatyadhivāsanajātīyaḥ karmadarśī nihatamāno dharmakāmaḥ |

T02bsu034_u:2257: tadanenāpi te kumāra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ yathāyaṃ samādhirbahubuddhadeśito bahubuddhavarṇito bahubuddhasaṃprakāśito bahubuddhapravicitaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:2258: bahūnāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikānmayā pravrajitvā ayaṃ kumāra sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhirvistareṇa śruta udgṛhītaḥ pṛṣṭo dhārito vācitaḥ pravartito 'raṇabhāvanayā bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:2259: atha khalu bhagavānimameva bahubuddhanirhārasamādhimukhaṃ pūrvayogakathānirdeśaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya vistareṇa gāthābhigītena saṃprakāśayati sma -

T02bsu034_u:2622: tatra bhagavāṃścandraprabhakumāramāmantrayate sma - tasmāt tarhi kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ samādhimudgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati

T02bsu034_u:2760: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśikho nāma gandharvaputraḥ pañcabhistūryaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ gaganatalādavatīrya bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthito
T02bsu034_u:2762: atha khalu pañcaśikhasya gandharvaputrasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ yathaivaḥ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ śakrasya ca devānāmindrasya sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāmupasthānaparicaryāṃ
T02bsu034_u:2763: karomi, saṃgītiṃ saṃprayojayāmi, tathaivādya devātidevasyāpi tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjāyai saṃgītiṃ saṃprayojayeyam ||

T02bsu034_u:2781: ye mucilinda mahāmucilinda vindhyatha gṛdhrakūṭo himavāṃśca // SRS_19.4 //
T02bsu034_u:2782: tatra pade nirayāśca sughorāstapana pratāpana ānabhiramyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2783: tatra ca ye niraye upapannā vedana te pi dukhāṃ anubhonti // SRS_19.5 //
T02bsu034_u:2784: tatra pade 'pi ca devavimānā dvādaśayojana te ramaṇīyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2785: teṣu bahū marutān sahasrā divyaratīṣu sukhānyanubhonti // SRS_19.6 //
T02bsu034_u:2786: tatra pade ca buddhāna utpādo śāsanu lokavidūna jvaleti /
T02bsu034_u:2787: taṃ ca na paśyati jñānavihīno yena na śodhita carya viśuddhā // SRS_19.7
T02bsu034_u:2788: tatra pade 'pi ca dharma niruddho nirvṛtu nāyaku śrūyati śabdaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2789: tatra pade 'pi ca keci śṛṇonti tiṣṭhati nāyaku bhāṣati dharmam // SRS_19.8
T02bsu034_u:2790: tatra pade 'pi ca keṣacidāyurvarṣa acintiya vartati saṃjñā /
T02bsu034_u:2792: tatra pade 'pi vā kālu karonti no ciru jīvati śrūyati śabdaḥ // SRS_19.9
T02bsu034_u:2793: tatra pade 'pi ca keṣaci saṃjñā dṛṣṭu tathāgatu pūjitu buddho /
T02bsu034_u:2794: toṣitu mānasu saṃjñagraheṇa no pi ca pūjitu no ca upanno // SRS_19.10 //
T02bsu034_u:2795: svasmi gṛhe supineva manuṣyo kāmaguṇeṣu ratīranubhūya /
T02bsu034_u:2796: sa pratibuddhu na paśyati kāmāṃstacca prajānati so supino ti // SRS_19.11
T02bsu034_u:2797: yat tatha dṛṣṭu śruta mata jñātaṃ sarvamidaṃ vitathaṃ supino vā /
T02bsu034_u:2798: yastu bhaveta samādhiya lābhī so imu jānati dharmasvabhāvān // SRS_19.12
T02bsu034_u:2799: sūsukhitāḥ sada te nara loke yeṣa priyāpriyu nāsti kahiṃcit /
T02bsu034_u:2800: ye vanakandarake 'bhiramanti śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti // SRS_19.13 //
T02bsu034_u:2801: yeṣa mamāpi tu nāsti kahiṃcid yeṣa parigrahu sarvaśu nāsti /
T02bsu034_u:2802: khaṅgasamā vicarantimu loke te gagane pavaneva vrajanti // SRS_19.14 //
T02bsu034_u:2803: bhāvitu mārga pravartitu jñānaṃ śūnyaka dharma nirātmanu sarve /
T02bsu034_u:2804: yena vibhāvita bhontimi dharmāstasya bhavet pratibhānamanantam //
T02bsu034_u:2805: sūsukhitā bata te nara kole yeṣa na sajjati mānasu loke /
T02bsu034_u:2806: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣviha cittaṃ no ca priyāpriyu vidyati saṅgo // SRS_19.16
T02bsu034_u:2808: apriyu ye dukhitehi nivāso ye hi priyā dukhi tehi viyogo /
T02bsu034_u:2809: anta ubhe api eti jahitvā te sukhitā nara ye rata dharme // SRS_19.17 //
T02bsu034_u:2810: ye anunīyati śrutvimi dharmān sa pratihanyati śrutva adharmam /
T02bsu034_u:2811: so madamānahato viparīto mānavaśena dukhi anubhoti // SRS_19.18 //
T02bsu034_u:2812: ye samatāya pratiṣṭhita bhonti nityamanunnata nāvanatāśca /
T02bsu034_u:2813: ye priyato 'priyataśca sumuktāste sada muktamanā viharanti // SRS_19.19 //
T02bsu034_u:2814: śīle pratiṣṭhitu sūpariśuddhe dhyāne pratiṣṭhitu nityamacintye /
T02bsu034_u:2815: ye vanakandari śānti ramante teṣa na vidyati vīmati jātu // SRS_19.20 //
T02bsu034_u:2816: ye ca punarvitathe pratipannāḥ kāmaguṇeṣu ratāḥ sada bālāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2817: gṛdhru yathā kuṇapeṣvadhimuktā nityavaśānugatā namucisya // SRS_19.21 //
T02bsu034_u:2818: asmin khalu punargāthābhinirhāre bhāṣyamāṇe candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ acintyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
T02bsu034_u:2820: pañcaśikhasya ca gandharvaputrasya ghoṣānugāyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt |
T02bsu034_u:2821: aprameyāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni
T02bsu034_u:2827: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvakuśalamūlaśikṣāguṇadharmaniśritena bhavitavyam
T02bsu034_u:2828: asaṃsargabahulena ca bhavitavyam, pāpamitraparivarjakena kalyāṇamitrasaṃniśritena paripṛcchakajātīyena dharmaparyeṣṭyāmatṛptena prāmodyabahulena
T02bsu034_u:2832: tena tasyāntike prītigauravaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñā cotpāditavyā| yaḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imān dharmān samādāya vartate, sa kṣipramanācchedyapratibhāvaniryāto bhavati |
T02bsu034_u:2836: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:2838: yad abhūṣi dvipadānamuttamo indraketudhvajarāja nāyakaḥ // SRS_20.1 //
T02bsu034_u:2839: so samādhimimu śāntu deśayi yatra nāsti naru jīva pudgalaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2840: māya budbuda marīci vidyutā sarva dharma dakacandrasaṃnibhāḥ // SRS_20.2
T02bsu034_u:2841: nāsti sattva manujo ca labhyate kālu kṛtva paraloki gacchi yo /
T02bsu034_u:2842: no ca karma kṛtu vipraṇaśyate kṛṣṇa śukla phala deti tādṛśam // SRS_20.3
T02bsu034_u:2843: eṣa yukti nayadvāra bhadrakaṃ sūkṣma durdṛśu jināna gocarā /
T02bsu034_u:2844: yatra akṣarapadaṃ na labhyate buddhabodhi bhagavān prajānati // SRS_20.4
T02bsu034_u:2847: buddhakoṭiniyutāna gocarastaṃ samādhi bhagavān prabhāṣate // SRS_20.5 //
T02bsu034_u:2850: sarva bālajana bhūtacodanā tīrthikehi parivarjitaḥ sadā /
T02bsu034_u:2851: śreṣṭha śīladhanu buddhavarṇitaṃ vidyuteva gagane na lipyate // SRS_20.7
T02bsu034_u:2852: yehi pūjita jināna koṭiyo dānaśīlacaritā vicakṣaṇāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2853: pāpamitra puri yehi varjitā teṣa paitṛkadhanaṃ niruttaram // SRS_20.8 //
T02bsu034_u:2854: tatra bhikṣu sthitu dharmabhāṇako brahmacāri sugatasya aurasaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2855: śrutva dharmamimamānulomikaṃ citta pādesi ya lokanāyakaḥ // SRS_20.9 //
T02bsu034_u:2857: bhikṣubhāva paramaṃ ti duṣkaraṃ cittupāda vara agrabodhaye // SRS_20.10 //
T02bsu034_u:2858: śīlu rakṣa maṇiratnasaṃnibhaṃ mitra seva sada ānulomikam /
T02bsu034_u:2859: pāpamitra na kadāci sevato buddhajñānamacireṇa lapsyase // SRS_20.11 //
T02bsu034_u:2863: āsi pūrvamiha jambusāhvaye apramatta duvi śreṣṭhidārakau /
T02bsu034_u:2864: pravrajitva sugatasya śāsane khaṅgabhūta vanaṣaṇḍamāśritau // SRS_21.1 //
T02bsu034_u:2866: antarikṣapadabhūmikovidau te asakta gagane vrajanti ca // SRS_21.2 //
T02bsu034_u:2867: te ca tatra vanaṣaṇḍi śītale nānapuṣpabharite manorame /
T02bsu034_u:2869: tena rāja mṛgayā aṭantake śabda śrutva vanu taṃ upāgamī /
T02bsu034_u:2870: dṛṣṭva pārthiva tatha dharmabhāṇakau teṣu prema paramaṃ upasthahi //
T02bsu034_u:2871: tehi sārdhu katha ānulomikīṃ kṛtva rāju purato niṣīdi so /
T02bsu034_u:2872: tasya rājña balakāya nantako ṣaṣṭhikoṭiniyutānyupāgamī // SRS_21.5 //
T02bsu034_u:2873: ekameku teṣu dharmabhāṇako rājamabravī śṛṇohi kṣatriyā /
T02bsu034_u:2874: buddhapādu paramaṃ sudurlabho apramattu sada bhohi pārthiva // SRS_21.6 //
T02bsu034_u:2875: āyu gacchati sadānavasthitaṃ girinadīya salileva śīghragam /
T02bsu034_u:2876: vyādhiśokajarapīḍitasya te nāsti trāṇu yatha karma bhadrakam // SRS_21.7
T02bsu034_u:2878: dharmapālu bhava rājakuñjarā rakṣimaṃ daśabalāna śāsanam /
T02bsu034_u:2879: kṣīṇa kāli parame sudāruṇe dharmapakṣi sthihi rājakuñjara // SRS_21.8 //
T02bsu034_u:2880: eva te bahuprakāra paṇḍitā ovadanti tada taṃ narādhipam /
T02bsu034_u:2882: śrutva dharma tada rājakuñjaraḥ sūratānakhilāna bhāṣato /
T02bsu034_u:2883: prītijāta sumanā udagrako vandya pāda śirasāya prakramī // SRS_21.10 //
T02bsu034_u:2884: tasya rājña bahavo 'nyabhikṣavo lābhakāma praviśintu tat kulam /
T02bsu034_u:2885: teṣa dṛṣṭa cariyā na tādṛśī teṣu rāja na tathā sagauravam // SRS_21.11 //
T02bsu034_u:2886: tacca śāsanamatītaśāstukaṃ paścimaṃ ca tada varṣu vartate /
T02bsu034_u:2887: jambudvīpi suparittabhājanā prādurbhūta bahavo asaṃyatāḥ // SRS_21.12 //
T02bsu034_u:2888: utka lubdha bahu tatra bhikṣavo lābhakāma upalambhadṛṣṭikāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2889: vipranaṣṭa sugatasya śāsanād grāhayiṃsu bahulaṃ tadā nṛpam // SRS_21.13 //
T02bsu034_u:2890: ghātayeti ubhi dharmabhāṇakau ye ucchedu pravadanti tīrthikāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2891: dīrghacārika samādapenti te nirvṛtīya na te kiṃci darśikā // SRS_21.14 //
T02bsu034_u:2892: karma naśyati vipāku naśyati skandha nāstīti vadanti kuhakāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2894: tāṃ kṣipāhi viṣayātu pārthiva evameva ciru dharma sthāsyati // SRS_21.15
T02bsu034_u:2895: śrutva teṣa vacanaṃ tadantaraṃ kāṅkṣa prāptu bhuta rājakuñjaraḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2896: ghātayiṣyi amu dharmabhāṇakau mā upekṣitu anartha bheṣyati // SRS_21.16 //
T02bsu034_u:2897: tasya rājña anubaddha devatā pūrvajāti sahacīrṇu cārikā /
T02bsu034_u:2898: dīrgharā hitakāma paṇḍitā sā avoci tada rājapārthivam // SRS_21.17 //
T02bsu034_u:2899: cittupāda ma janehi īdṛśaṃ pāpamitravacanena kṣatriyā /
T02bsu034_u:2900: mā tva bhikṣu duvi dharmabhāṇakau pāpamitravacanena ghātaya // SRS_21.18
T02bsu034_u:2901: na tva kiṃci smarasī narādhipa yatti tehi vanaṣaṇḍi bhāṣitam |
T02bsu034_u:2902: kṣīṇakāli parame sudāruṇe dharmapakṣi sthihi rājakuñjara /
T02bsu034_u:2903: rāja bhūtavacanena coditaḥ so na riñjati jināna śāsanam // SRS_21.19 //
T02bsu034_u:2904: tasya rājña tada bhrāta dāruṇaḥ prātisīmiku sa tehi grāhitaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:2905: eṣa deva tava bhrāta pāpako jīvitena na jātu nandate /
T02bsu034_u:2906: tau ca bhikṣu duvi ghora vaidyakā te vrajanti gaganena vidyayā //
T02bsu034_u:2907: te sma śrutva tava mūlamāgatā sarvi bhūta tava vijñapematha /
T02bsu034_u:2908: kṣipra ghātaya ghora vaidyakā mā ti paści anutāpu bheṣyati // SRS_21.21 //
T02bsu034_u:2911: sarvasainyaparivārito nṛpo yatra bhikṣu vani taṃ upāgato // SRS_21.22 //
T02bsu034_u:2912: jñātva ghoramatidāruṇaṃ nṛpaṃ nāga yakṣa vani tatra ye sthitāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2913: iṣṭavarṣa tada tatra pātita tena rāja sahasenayā hato // SRS_21.23 //
T02bsu034_u:2914: pāpamitravacanena paśyathā kālu kṛtva tada rāja dāruṇam /
T02bsu034_u:2915: yena krodhu kṛtu dharmabhāṇake so avīci gatu ṣaṣṭijātiyo // SRS_21.24 //
T02bsu034_u:2916: te 'pi bhikṣu bahavopalambhikā yehi grāhitu rāja kṣatriyo /
T02bsu034_u:2917: jātikoṭiśata apyacintiyo vedayiṃsu narakeṣu vedanām // SRS_21.25 //
T02bsu034_u:2918: devatā yāya rāju codito yāya rakṣita dharmabhāṇakau /
T02bsu034_u:2919: tāya buddha yatha gaṅgavālikā dṛṣṭva pūjita carantu cārikām // SRS_21.26
T02bsu034_u:2920: ṣaṣṭikoṭiniyutā anūnakā yehi dharma śrutu sārdhu rājinā /
T02bsu034_u:2921: yehi bodhivaracittu pāditaṃ buddha bhūyi pṛthulokadhātuṣu // SRS_21.27 //
T02bsu034_u:2923: tehi sarvimu samādhi bhadrakaṃ deśayitva dvipadendu nirvṛtā // SRS_21.28
T02bsu034_u:2925: apramatta bhavathā atandritā buddhajñānamacireṇa lapsyathā // SRS_21.29 //
T02bsu034_u:2932: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāt tarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kāye 'nadhyavasitena jīvite nirapekṣeṇa bhavitavyam |
T02bsu034_u:2933: tat kasya hetoḥ? kāyajīvitādhyavasānahetorhi kumāra akuśaladharmābhisaṃskāro bhavati |
T02bsu034_u:2934: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpakāyatastathāgataḥ prajñātavyaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:2936: dharmakāyā hi buddhā bhagavanto dharmakāyaprabhāvitāśca na rūpakāyaprabhāvitāḥ |
T02bsu034_u:2937: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatakāyaṃ prārthayitukāmena tathāgatakāyaṃ jñātukāmena ayaṃ samādhirudgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo vācayitavyo bhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:2938: tatra kumāra tathāgatasya kāyaḥ śatapuṇyanirjātayā buddhyānekārthanirdeśo dharmanirjātaḥ ānimittaḥ sarvanimittāpagato gambhīraḥ apramāṇaḥ apramāṇadharmaḥ ānimittasvabhāvaḥ sarvanimittavibhāvitaḥ acalo
T02bsu034_u:2942: buddhajñānaṃ prārthayitukāmānāṃ ghoṣapathasamatikrāntaḥ sasāro rāgasamatikrāntaḥ abhedyo doṣapathasamatikrānto dṛḍho mohapathasamatikrānto nirdiṣṭaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:2943: śūnyatānirdeśena ajāto jātisamatikrāntaḥ anāsravaḥ vipākasamatikrāntaḥ nityo vyāhāreṇa |
T02bsu034_u:2944: vyavahāraśca śūnyaḥ nirviśeṣo nirvāṇena, nirvṛtaḥ śabdena, śānto ghoṣeṇa, sāmānyaḥ saṃketena,
T02bsu034_u:2946: śītalo niṣparidānaḥ animittaḥ amanyitaḥ aninditaḥ aprapañcitaḥ - alpaśabdo nirdeśena |
T02bsu034_u:2950: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:2952: imaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvitvā kāyaṃ buddhasya jñāsyati // SRS_22.1 //
T02bsu034_u:2955: sameti so 'ntarīkṣeṇa nānātvaṃ nāsya labhyate // SRS_22.2 //
T02bsu034_u:2957: yādṛśā lakṣaṇāstasya kāyastasya hi tādṛśaḥ // SRS_22.3 //
T02bsu034_u:2959: balā vimokṣā dhyānāni sarve te 'pyekalakṣaṇāḥ // SRS_22.4 //
T02bsu034_u:2961: na jātu kenacicchakyaṃ paśyituṃ māṃsacakṣuṣā // SRS_22.5 //
T02bsu034_u:2962: bahū evaṃ pravakṣyanti dṛṣṭo me lokanāyakaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2965: yenāsau dṛśyate kāyo lakṣaṇehi vicitritaḥ // SRS_22.7 //
T02bsu034_u:2967: na ca pramāṇaṃ kāyasya labdhaṃ tena acintiyaḥ // SRS_22.8 //
T02bsu034_u:2968: yadi pramāṇaṃ labhyeta kāyo buddhasya ettakaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2971: tallakṣaṇaṃ nāmarūpaṃ śuddhaṃ bhoti prabhāsvaram // SRS_22.10 //
T02bsu034_u:2972: na caiṣa kenacijjātu samādhiḥ śāntu bhāvitaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2975: samādherasya vaipulyāt kāyo mahyaṃ na dṛśyate // SRS_22.12 //
T02bsu034_u:2976: yasya vo yādṛśaṃ cittaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pi tādṛśam /
T02bsu034_u:2979: visabhāgāya saṃjñāya udāraṃ cittu jāyate // SRS_22.14 //
T02bsu034_u:2980: yasya co mṛdukī saṃjñā nāmarūpasmi vartate /
T02bsu034_u:2981: agṛdhraṃ nāmarūpasmi cittaṃ bhoti prabhāsvaram // SRS_22.15 //
T02bsu034_u:2983: tisro me pāpikāḥ saṃjñā naivotpannāḥ kadācana // SRS_22.16 //
T02bsu034_u:2985: anāsravaṃ ca me cittaṃ kalpakoṭyo hyacintiyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:2986: karomi cārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na ca me kāyu dṛśyate // SRS_22.17 //
T02bsu034_u:2987: yathā ca yasya bhāvehi vimuktaṃ bhoti mānasam /
T02bsu034_u:2988: na tasya tehi bhāvehi bhūyo bhoti samāgamaḥ // SRS_22.18 //
T02bsu034_u:2990: svabhāvo jñātu cittasya bhūyo jñānaṃ pravartate // SRS_22.19 //
T02bsu034_u:2992: kurvanti cārthaṃ sattvānāṃ yatra kāyo na labhyate // SRS_22.20 //
T02bsu034_u:2994: kāyo nirabhilāpyo me durvijñeyo nidarśitaḥ // SRS_22.21 //
T02bsu034_u:2996: na jātu rūpakāyeṇa śakyaṃ prajñāpituṃ jino // SRS_22.22 //
T02bsu034_u:2998: na tasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhiṣyati // SRS_22.23 //
T02bsu034_u:2999: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ gambhīraṃ yasya trāso na bheṣyati /
T02bsu034_u:3000: na cāsau jīvitārthāya buddhabodhiṃ pratikṣipet // SRS_22.24 //
T02bsu034_u:3002: ālokabhūto lokānāṃ yena yena gamiṣyati // SRS_22.25 //
T02bsu034_u:3003: tatra kumāra tathāgatasya kāyo nimittakarmaṇāpi na sukaraṃ jñātum |
T02bsu034_u:3004: nīlo vā nīlavarṇo vā nīlanidarśano vā nīlanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3005: pīto vā pītavarṇo vā pītanidarśano vā pītanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3006: lohito vā lohitavarṇo vā lohitanidarśano vā lohitanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3007: avadāto vā avadātavarṇo vā avadātanidarśano vā avadātanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3008: mañjiṣṭho vā mañjiṣṭhavarṇo vā mañjiṣṭhanidarśano vā mañjiṣṭhanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3009: sphaṭiko vā sphaṭikavarṇo vā sphaṭikanidarśano vā sphaṭikanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3010: āgneyo vā agnivarṇo vā agninidarśano vā agninirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3011: sarpirmaṇḍopamo vā sarpirvarṇo vā sarpirnidarśano vā sarpirnirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3012: sauvarṇo vā suvarṇavarṇo vā suvarṇanidarśano vā suvarṇanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3013: vaidūryo vā vaidūryavarṇo vā vaidūryanidarśano vā vaidūryanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3014: vidyudvā vā vidyudvarṇo vā vidyunnidarśano vā vidyunnirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3015: brahmo vā brahmavarṇo vā brahmanidarśano vā brahmanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3016: devo vā devavarṇo vā devanidarśano vā devanirbhāso vā |
T02bsu034_u:3017: iti hi kumāra tathāgatasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ sarvanimittairapyacintyaḥ apyacintyanirdeśo rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā
T02bsu034_u:3018: na sukaraṃ sadevakenāpi lokena kāyasya pramāṇamudgrahītumanyatra sarvākārairacintyaḥ aprameyaḥ
T02bsu034_u:3019: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:3023: na teṣāṃ labhyate anto ettakā paramāṇavaḥ // SRS_22.26 //
T02bsu034_u:3032: śakyaṃ jānituṃ buddhasya viśeṣo hīdṛśo mama // SRS_22.30 //
T02bsu034_u:3036: acintiyā hi te kāyā dharmakāyaprabhāvitāḥ // SRS_22.32 //
T02bsu034_u:3038: tathā hi tasya kāyasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate // SRS_22.33 //
T02bsu034_u:3039: aprameyā hi te dharmāḥ kalpakoṭyo niṣevitāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3040: teno acintiyaḥ kāyo nirvṛto me prabhāsvaraḥ // SRS_22.34 //
T02bsu034_u:3042: tathā hi kāyo buddhasya apramāṇo hyacintiyaḥ // SRS_22.35 //
T02bsu034_u:3047: apramāṇaṃ yathākāśaṃ mātuṃ śakyaṃ na kenacit /
T02bsu034_u:3049: ye kāyamevaṃ jānanti buddhānāṃ te jinātmajāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3050: te 'pi buddhā bhaviṣyanti lokanāthā acintiyāḥ // SRS_22.39 //
T02bsu034_u:3054: tasmāttarhi kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ākāṅkṣet kimityahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti
T02bsu034_u:3055: katamāścatasraḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvidaṃ dharmapratisaṃvidaṃ niruktipratisaṃvidaṃ pratibhānapratisaṃvidam
T02bsu034_u:3056: imāścatasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti, tena kumāra bodhisattvena
T02bsu034_u:3057: mahāsattvena ayaṃ samādhirudgrahītavyaḥ partavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
T02bsu034_u:3060: tatra kumāra katamā dharmapratisaṃvidaḥ? imāḥ kumāra bodhisattvo dharmapratisaṃvida evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate - yāvanto vā rūpavyāhārāstāvantastathāgatasya varṇavyāhārāḥ |
T02bsu034_u:3063: iti hi kumāra aprameyā acintyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ atulyāmāpyāparimāṇāstathāgatasya rūpavarṇavyāhārāḥ
T02bsu034_u:3064: iti hi kumāra aparyantā anantā rūpavyāhārāḥ |
T02bsu034_u:3067: iti hi anantā aparyantā acintyā vijñānavyāhārāḥ |
T02bsu034_u:3069: iti hi kumāra aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ saṃskṛte doṣāḥ |
T02bsu034_u:3072: iti hi kumāra yāvanti nirvāṇanāmāni tāvantastathāgatasya varṇāḥ |
T02bsu034_u:3075: catvāra ime kumāra tathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyavyāhārāḥ |
T02bsu034_u:3080: ime kumāra catvārastathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyavyāhārāḥ |
T02bsu034_u:3081: catvāra ime kumāra tathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyanirdeśāḥ |
T02bsu034_u:3153: iti hi yā kumāra dhāraṇī tajjñānam, sa dharmaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:3158: dharmajñāne yā vyavahāradeśanā ācakṣaṇā prajñapanā prakāśanā prasthāpanā vicaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkaraṇatā asaktavacanatā anelāmūkavacanatā anavalīnavacanatā,
T02bsu034_u:3160: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:3167: anantā nāmavyāhārā ye me pūrvaṃ prakāśitāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3168: śīlanāmā buddhanāmā sattvanāmā ca te samāḥ // SRS_23.4 //
T02bsu034_u:3169: yāttakāḥ saṃskṛte doṣā nirvāṇe tāttakā guṇāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3170: buddhasya tāttakā varṇā aupamyā me prakāśitāḥ // SRS_23.5 //
T02bsu034_u:3175: tato bhūyo narendrasya svarāṅgavarṇa bhāṣitāḥ // SRS_23.7 //
T02bsu034_u:3177: ekasattvasya te nāmāḥ sarvasattvāna darśitāḥ // SRS_23.8 //
T02bsu034_u:3181: idaṃ sūtraṃ pravartitvā anolīnaḥ prakāśayet // SRS_23.10 //
T02bsu034_u:3185: idaṃ sūtraṃ samudgṛhya bhavanti jñānasaṃpadaḥ // SRS_23.12 //
T02bsu034_u:3186: yathā yathā prakāśenti śraddadhanto imaṃ nayam /
T02bsu034_u:3187: tathāsya vardhate jñānaṃ himavanteva pādapāḥ // SRS_23.13 //
T02bsu034_u:3191: tatra kumāra kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmapratisaṃvidi caran dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī samudāgacchatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī nānyatra rūpeṇa bodhiṃ samanupaśyati |
T02bsu034_u:3198: anyad rūpamanyo rūpasvabhāva iti naivaṃ paśyati |
T02bsu034_u:3200: yaśca rūpasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā |
T02bsu034_u:3202: evaṃ nānyatra vedanāyā nānyatra saṃjñāyā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānena bodhiṃ samanupaśyati
T02bsu034_u:3211: yaśca vijñānasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā |
T02bsu034_u:3213: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:3214: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam /
T02bsu034_u:3215: visabhāgena śabdena uttaro dharma deśitaḥ // SRS_24.1 //
T02bsu034_u:3216: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3217: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ nāsya labhyate // SRS_24.2 //
T02bsu034_u:3219: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate // SRS_24.3 //
T02bsu034_u:3221: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu nirvāṇaṃ saṃprakāśitam // SRS_24.4 //
T02bsu034_u:3222: nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛtī vuttā nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate /
T02bsu034_u:3223: apravṛttyaiva dharmāṇāṃ yathā paścāttathā purā // SRS_24.5 //
T02bsu034_u:3225: jñātā naiṣkramyasārehi ye yuktā buddhaśāsane // SRS_24.6 //
T02bsu034_u:3227: paśyitvā kāyu buddhasya vakṣyante dṛṣṭu nāyakaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3228: na cāhaṃ rūpakāyena paśyituṃ śakya kenacit // SRS_24.7 //
T02bsu034_u:3231: evaṃ pañcāna skandhānāṃ jñānaṃ me dharmalakṣaṇam /
T02bsu034_u:3232: jñātvā svabhāvaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmakāye pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_24.9 //
T02bsu034_u:3234: na ca dharmata buddhānāṃ śakyaṃ vācāya bhāṣitum // SRS_24.10 //
T02bsu034_u:3236: ghoṣamātreṇa vakṣyanti dṛṣṭo me naranāyakaḥ // SRS_24.11 //
T02bsu034_u:3238: na jātu śabdasaṃjñasya bhavate śāstṛdarśanam // SRS_24.12 //
T02bsu034_u:3240: na cānyā śūnyatā uktā anyā rūpasvabhāvatā /
T02bsu034_u:3241: yastu rūpaṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti śunyatām // SRS_24.13 //
T02bsu034_u:3243: na cāsau mārakoṭībhirbhūyaḥ śakya parājitum // SRS_24.14 //
T02bsu034_u:3244: prajānāti hi yo rūpaṃ sa prajānāti śūnyatām /
T02bsu034_u:3245: ya śūnyatāṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti nirvṛtim // SRS_24.15 //
T02bsu034_u:3251: paryupthitāśca vakṣyanti na etad buddhaśāsanam // SRS_24.18 //
T02bsu034_u:3255: evaṃ sā bheṣyate icchā jñātralābhagaveṣaṇe // SRS_24.20 //
T02bsu034_u:3262: gṛhikarma kariṣyanti mārasya viṣaye sthitāḥ // SRS_24.23 //
T02bsu034_u:3264: praviśya ca gṛhāṃsteṣāṃ dūṣayiṣyanti tān kulān // SRS_24.24 //
T02bsu034_u:3266: teṣāṃ ca vipravustānāṃ putradārāṇi dūṣayi // SRS_24.25 //
T02bsu034_u:3270: yathā te pravrajitvā hi paradāreṣu mūrcchitāḥ // SRS_24.27 //
T02bsu034_u:3272: sā śikṣā teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tasmin kāle na bheṣyati // SRS_24.28 //
T02bsu034_u:3274: yā ca sā uttamā pūjā pratipattirna bheṣyati // SRS_24.29 //
T02bsu034_u:3276: anyonyamevaṃ vakṣyanti ete 'pi yādṛśā vayam // SRS_24.30 //
T02bsu034_u:3277: śrutvā śīlasya te varṇaṃ duḥśīlāḥ pāpagocarāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3279: na ca hrī bheṣyate teṣāṃ naṣṭaṃ śrāmaṇakaṃ dhanam /
T02bsu034_u:3282: dharmaṃ pratikṣipitvā ca vāso 'vīcau bhaviṣyati // SRS_24.33 //
T02bsu034_u:3283: na me śrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ vā yeṣāmetādṛśī carī /
T02bsu034_u:3285: yā teṣāṃ kuhanā tatra śāṭhiyaṃ vākkiyaṃ tadā /
T02bsu034_u:3286: jānāmi tadahaṃ sarvaṃ jñānaṃ me 'tra pravartate // SRS_24.35 //
T02bsu034_u:3287: sacet kalpaṃ prabhāṣeyaṃ yatteṣāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /
T02bsu034_u:3290: mā tehi saṃstavaṃ sārdhaṃ kuryāstvaṃ kāli paścime // SRS_24.37 //
T02bsu034_u:3295: kuryā hi gauravaṃ tatra śirasā pādavandanam // SRS_24.39 //
T02bsu034_u:3297: pratighātaṃ na janayet maitracittaḥ sadā bhavet // SRS_24.40 //
T02bsu034_u:3299: yādṛśaṃ kāhitī karma lapsyate tādṛśaṃ phalam // SRS_24.41 //
T02bsu034_u:3303: evaṃ cittaṃ pradadhyāstvaṃ sarve bheṣyanti nāyakāḥ // SRS_24.43 //
T02bsu034_u:3305: prathamaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeyyā nāhaṃ vaipulyaśikṣitaḥ // SRS_24.44 //
T02bsu034_u:3306: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyyā āyuṣmān vijña paṇḍitaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3307: kathaṃ mahātmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā // SRS_24.45 //
T02bsu034_u:3308: sahasaiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā ca bhājanam /
T02bsu034_u:3309: yadi bhājanaṃ vijānīyā anadhīṣṭo 'pi deśayet // SRS_24.46 //
T02bsu034_u:3311: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣestvāṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ // SRS_24.47 //
T02bsu034_u:3313: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām // SRS_24.48 //
T02bsu034_u:3314: parīttā yadi pāpecchā śīlavanto bahū bhavet /
T02bsu034_u:3315: labdhapakṣastadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayet // SRS_24.49 //
T02bsu034_u:3316: pūrvaṃ pariṣadaṃ jñātvā yadi śuddhā bhavettadā /
T02bsu034_u:3317: yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ sarvāṃstebhyaḥ prakāśayet // SRS_24.50 //
T02bsu034_u:3318: dānaṃ śīlaṃ tathā kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ śrutaṃ tathā /
T02bsu034_u:3321: eteṣāṃ varṇa bhāṣeta evaṃ hi dhārayet sukham // SRS_24.52 //
T02bsu034_u:3323: pratisaṃlānu seveta na dānaparamo bhavet // SRS_24.53 //
T02bsu034_u:3328: kārayet pūja buddhasya samādhiṃ śāntameṣatā // SRS_24.55 //
T02bsu034_u:3340: durlabhā śāsane śraddhā pravrajyā upasaṃpadā // SRS_24.61 //
T02bsu034_u:3341: yena ārāgitaḥ śāstā cittaṃ bodhāya nāmitam /
T02bsu034_u:3342: mā cala tvaṃ pratijñāyāstiṣṭha ca pratipattiṣu // SRS_24.62 //
T02bsu034_u:3343: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāle upasthite /
T02bsu034_u:3344: pratibhānaṃ labhet kṣipraṃ pravṛttaṃ yadi dhārayet // SRS_24.63 //
T02bsu034_u:3346: kiṃ vā punaḥ sarvasūtraṃ dhārayed yaḥ śrutārthikaḥ // SRS_24.64 //
T02bsu034_u:3348: yaḥ kuryād gauraveṇāsau kalpasattvopamān sadā // SRS_24.65 //
T02bsu034_u:3349: itaḥ samādhito yaśca gāthāmekāṃ pi dhārayet /
T02bsu034_u:3350: sarvaṃ purimakaṃ puṇyaṃ kalāṃ nopaiti ṣoḍaśīm // SRS_24.66 //
T02bsu034_u:3352: imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutveha yaḥ kāṅkṣāṃ na kariṣyati // SRS_24.67 //
T02bsu034_u:3356: tatra bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma -
T02bsu034_u:3358: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakuśalo bhavati? iha kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike jñātisaṃjñā utpādayitavyā |
T02bsu034_u:3359: sarvasattvānāmantike jñāticittamupasthāpya yaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhastat sarvamanumodayitavyam
T02bsu034_u:3360: trirātryāstridivasasya sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhamanumodya sarvajñatārambaṇena cittotpādena teṣāmeva sarvasattvānāṃ niryātayitavyam |
T02bsu034_u:3361: anena kuśalamūlena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramimaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate,kṣipraṃ
T02bsu034_u:3363: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:3364: sarve mama jñātaya eti sattvāḥ yasteṣamastī pṛthu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3365: rātrestrirevaṃ divasasya ca trīranumodamī emu janitva cittam // SRS_25.1
T02bsu034_u:3366: anumodamī ye suviśuddhaśīlā ye jīvitārthe na karonti pāpam /
T02bsu034_u:3367: adhimuktisaṃpanna ya bodhisattvā anumodamī teṣa ya kiṃci puṇyam //
T02bsu034_u:3368: anumodamī yeṣa prasādu buddhe dharme prasādo 'sti tathaiva saṃghe /
T02bsu034_u:3369: anumodamī ye sugatasya pūjāṃ kurvanti bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇāḥ // SRS_25.3
T02bsu034_u:3370: anumodamī yeṣa na ātmadṛṣṭirna bhāvadṛṣṭirna ca jīvadṛṣṭiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3372: anumodamī yeṣa na pāpadṛṣṭirye śūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭva janenti tuṣṭim // SRS_25.4
T02bsu034_u:3373: anumodamī ye sugatasya śāsane labhanti pravrajyopasaṃpadaṃ ca /
T02bsu034_u:3374: alpeccha saṃtuṣṭa vane vasanti praśāntacāritra ye dhyānagocarāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:3375: anumodamī ekaka ye 'dvitīyā vane vasantī sada khaḍgabhūtāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3376: ājīvaśuddhāḥ sada alpakṛtyā ye jñātrahetorna na karenti kūhanām //
T02bsu034_u:3377: anumodamī yeṣa na saṃstavo 'sti na cāpi īrṣyā na kuleṣu tṛṣṇā /
T02bsu034_u:3378: uttrasti traidhātuki nityakālam anopaliptā vicaranti loke // SRS_25.7 //
T02bsu034_u:3379: anumodamī yeṣa prapañcu nāsti nirviṇṇa sarvāsu bhavopapattiṣu /
T02bsu034_u:3380: avigṛhītā upaśāntacittā na durlabhasteṣa samādhireṣaḥ // SRS_25.8 //
T02bsu034_u:3381: anumodamī ye gaṇadoṣa dṛṣṭvā sarvān vivādān parivarjayitvā /
T02bsu034_u:3382: sevantyaraṇyaṃ vanamūlamāśritā vimuktisārāḥ sugatasya putrāḥ // SRS_25.9
T02bsu034_u:3383: anumodamī ye viharantyaraṇye nātmānamutkarṣi parānna paṃsaye /
T02bsu034_u:3384: anumodamī yeṣa pramādu nāsti ye apramattā ima buddhaśāsane // SRS_25.10 //
T02bsu034_u:3385: yāvanta dharmāḥ pṛthu bodhipākṣikāḥ sarveṣa mūlaṃ hyayamapramādaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3386: ye buddhaputrāḥ sada apramattā na durlabhasteṣa ayaṃ samādhiḥ // SRS_25.11
T02bsu034_u:3387: nidhānalābhaḥ sugatāna śāsanaṃ pravrajyalābho dvitīyaṃ nidhānam /
T02bsu034_u:3390: śratvā imaṃ śūnyata buddhagocaraṃ tasyāpratikṣepu nidhānalambhaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3391: anantu pratibhānu nidhānalambho yā dhāraṇī tat paramaṃ nidhānam //
T02bsu034_u:3392: yāvanti dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaṃ śrutaṃ tyāgu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3393: sarveṣa mūlaṃ hyayamapramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśitaḥ // SRS_25.14
T02bsu034_u:3394: ye apramattā iha buddhaśāsane samyak ca yeṣāṃ praṇidhānamasti /
T02bsu034_u:3395: na durlabhasteṣa ayaṃ samādhirāsannabhūtā iha buddhaśāsane // SRS_25.15 //
T02bsu034_u:3399: tasmāttarhi kumāra apramatto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam,
