T02bsu034_u:3745: vani vasati vimukti sevato 'syā imi guṇa bhonti araṇyavāsi sarve //
T02bsu034_u:3746: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍacārikasya dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
T02bsu034_u:3758: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍapātikasya dhūpaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
T02bsu034_u:3761: lābhālābhe samacitto yo dhūteṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_28.77 //
T02bsu034_u:3762: notsṛjatyāryavaṃśaṃ ca kuhanā lapanā na ca /
T02bsu034_u:3763: utkarṣeti na cātmānaṃ parān paṃsayate na ca // SRS_28.78 //
T02bsu034_u:3765: grāhyaṃ si vacanaṃ bhoti piṇḍapāte guṇā amī // SRS_28.79 //
T02bsu034_u:3766: na mārgate jñātra yaśo na lābhaṃ caturāryavaṃśe bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3767: akuhako alapaku bhoti paṇḍito dhūtādhimuktasya imīdṛśā guṇāḥ // SRS_28.80
T02bsu034_u:3768: nātmānamutkarṣi parānna paṃsī puruṣaṃ pi ukto na kadāci kupyate /
T02bsu034_u:3769: varṇaṃ pi śrutvā janaye na harṣaṃ yaḥ piṇḍapātena bhaveta tuṣṭaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:3770: nirāmiṣaṃ deti ca dharmadānaṃ na lābhasatkāra gaveṣate 'sau /
T02bsu034_u:3771: grāhyā ca tasya bhavate 'sya bhāṣitaṃ dhūtādhimuktasya ime 'nuśaṃsāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:3772: iti hi kumāra evaṃrūpeṣu dhūtaguṇeṣu pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'raṇye viharan buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate |
T02bsu034_u:3777: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?imāḥ kumāra vivekacārī bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ pratilabhate |
T02bsu034_u:3778: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati |
T02bsu034_u:3779: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati
T02bsu034_u:3781: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate |
T02bsu034_u:3782: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanidhānaṃ
T02bsu034_u:3783: pratilabhate? yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti, taṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena śrotradhātunā sarvaṃ śṛṇoti |
T02bsu034_u:3786: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate |
T02bsu034_u:3787: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ
T02bsu034_u:3791: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate |
T02bsu034_u:3792: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate? so 'bhijñayā
T02bsu034_u:3794: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate
T02bsu034_u:3795: saṃkṣiptena kumāra evaṃguṇadharmapratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmān pratilabhate yatrābhūmiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām, kaḥ punarvādaḥ sarvaparapravādinām ||
T02bsu034_u:3797: buddhanidhānaṃ ca dharmanidhānaṃ jñānanidhānaṃ ca pūrvāntanidhānam /
T02bsu034_u:3798: pañca abhijñāḥ sa kṣipraṃ labhati yo vidu raṇṇi sadā sthitu bhoti //
T02bsu034_u:3802: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma -
T02bsu034_u:3803: tasmāttarhi kumāra divyāni cakravartirājyaiśvaryasukhānyapahāya pravrajiṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam |
T02bsu034_u:3804: pravrajitena kumāra dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitena vivekacāriṇā kṣāntisauratyasaṃpannena bhavitavyam
T02bsu034_u:3805: sadā ca ārabdhavīryeṇa te kumāra ādīptaśiraścailopamena ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyaḥ pravartayitavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo 'raṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ khaṅgaviṣāṇabhūtena advitīyena ca te kumāra araṇyaniṣeviṇā sadā bhavitavyam |
T02bsu034_u:3806: ātmaparityāgenāpi te kumāra sarvasattvānāmarthaḥ sadā karaṇīya iti ||
T02bsu034_u:3807: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyā velāyāmetamevārthamudbhāvayaṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ pūrvayogakathāparivartaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
T02bsu034_u:3808: smaramī atīta bahukalpaśatā yada āsi nāyaku anantayaśāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3809: naradevanāgagaṇapūjaniyo nāmena tejaguṇi rāja jino // SRS_29.1 //
T02bsu034_u:3811: dhūtavṛtta saṃlekhita śāntamanāḥ iti tasya tena samayena gaṇāḥ // SRS_29.2
T02bsu034_u:3813: ratanāna saptana viśiṣṭavarā iha jambudvīpi tada kāli abhūt // SRS_29.3 //
T02bsu034_u:3814: tada kāli te puravarā sakalāḥ pratimaṇḍitā bahu udyānaśataiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3815: udyāna sarvi ghanameghanibhāḥ phalapuṣpamaṇḍita tarunicitāḥ // SRS_29.4 //
T02bsu034_u:3823: iti pakṣi samāgata kāli tadā kalaviṅkamayūravihaṅgarutaiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3824: parapuṣṭa śārika vicitra dvijā bahupakṣighoṣaruta nānavidhāḥ // SRS_29.8
T02bsu034_u:3828: pratimaṇḍitāḥ surabhigandhavarāḥ śobhanti puṣkariṇiyo rucirāḥ // SRS_29.10
T02bsu034_u:3829: tahi kāli rāja iha jambudhvaje dṛḍhadattu āsi manujādhipatiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3830: putrāṇa tasya abhu pañcaśatāḥ prāsādikāḥ paramadarśanikāḥ // SRS_29.11 //
T02bsu034_u:3831: tahi kāli rājyu śivu kṣema abhūt anupadrutaṃ suramaṇīya śivam /
T02bsu034_u:3832: ayu jambudvīpa kusumairnicito nirviṃśeṣa devabhavanehi samam // SRS_29.12
T02bsu034_u:3834: tahi kāli so daśabalo anidho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
T02bsu034_u:3835: svapnopamā bhavagatī sakalā na va kaści jāyati na co mriyate // SRS_29.13
T02bsu034_u:3836: na sattva labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3838: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloki saṃkramati gacchati vā /
T02bsu034_u:3839: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalameti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato //
T02bsu034_u:3840: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca ucchedu puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3841: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punaraspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
T02bsu034_u:3842: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3843: na ca dṛṣṭisthānu gatiśuddhiriho na ca sattvacaru na praśāntagatī //
T02bsu034_u:3844: anupādu śāntu animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocaru jināna guṇāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3845: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā // SRS_29.18 //
T02bsu034_u:3848: na ca sa prajānatīha svabhāvu kvaci agatāgatī nipuṇadharmagatī /
T02bsu034_u:3850: na ca dharmadhātu vrajatīha kvaci evaṃ gatī agati dharmagatī // SRS_29.20
T02bsu034_u:3851: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu svabhāvagatī gatiyo svabhāvu na kahiṃci sthitaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3852: asthitā aniśritā svabhāvagatī jinagocaro viraju śāntapadam // SRS_29.21 //
T02bsu034_u:3853: śāntapraśānta upaśāntagatī na ca sā gatī kvacana saṃsthihatī /
T02bsu034_u:3854: bhāvu svabhāvu nugatāḥ satataṃ nipuṇaṃ sudurdṛśu padaṃ acalam // SRS_29.22
T02bsu034_u:3855: na ca sā calā hi svayameva sthitā asthitā anāgata svabhāvu sthitā /
T02bsu034_u:3856: na ca śakya bhāṣitu svabhāvu sthitī śūnyā ca sā acalu dharmasthitī //
T02bsu034_u:3857: ghoṣaśca ukta na ca ghoṣagatī ghoṣasvabhāvagati dharmagatī /
T02bsu034_u:3858: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu sthitī ca kvaci evaṃsvabhāvu gati dharmagatī //
T02bsu034_u:3859: gatiśabda uktu na ca sattvagatī dharmasvabhāva nipuṇārthagatī /
T02bsu034_u:3860: ghoṣo 'pi coktu na ca sattvagatī na ca ghoṣu labhyati na sattvagatiḥ //
T02bsu034_u:3861: na ca ananta nānta na ca madhyagatiḥ naivāsti nāsti na ca deśagatī /
T02bsu034_u:3862: jñātā ca yādṛśa svabhāvagatī iya deśanā jinavarāṇa samā // SRS_29.26 //
T02bsu034_u:3863: virajaṃ viśuddhi paramārthapadaṃ śānta praśānta arajaṃ virajam /
T02bsu034_u:3864: na ca kalpa manyana praśāntapadaṃ jinu bhāṣate paramakāruṇiko // SRS_29.27
T02bsu034_u:3866: na pi cāsti akṣarapracāra iho vipulā gatirvipulā arthagatī /
T02bsu034_u:3867: buddhehi sevita jinehi stutā avabhāsa dharmanaya sūkṣmagatī // SRS_29.28
T02bsu034_u:3868: dharmanidhāna virajaṃ vipulaṃ yatra sthitā apratimā sugatā /
T02bsu034_u:3869: deśenti dharmaratanaṃ virajaṃ paramārthaśūnya nipuṇārthagatī // SRS_29.29
T02bsu034_u:3870: aśrauṣi rāja dṛḍhadattu tadā dvipadendra bhāṣati samādhimimam /
T02bsu034_u:3871: so 'śītikoṭinayutehi tadā upasaṃkramī tada jinu kāruṇikam // SRS_29.30 //
T02bsu034_u:3872: balavantu gauravu janetva jine vanditva pādu manujādhipatiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3873: purataḥ sthito daśabalasya tadā kṛtāñjalirdaśanakhaḥ pramuditaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:3874: tasyo viditva pariśuddha carīṃ jina indriyeṣu vaśi pāragataḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3875: adhumuktikovidu naraḥ pravaro imu tasya deśayi samādhivaram // SRS_29.32
T02bsu034_u:3876: yada tena rājña paramārtha śruto utpanna prīti ariyā vipulā /
T02bsu034_u:3877: ujjhitva dvīpa sakalāṃścaturo vijahitva kāma abhiniṣkrami so // SRS_29.33
T02bsu034_u:3878: yada rāja pravraji jahitva mahīṃ bodhāya arthiku bhaviṣyajinaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3879: sarve manuṣya iha jambudhvaje vijahitva kāmaratī pravrajitā // SRS_29.34
T02bsu034_u:3880: vipulo gaṇo daśabalasya tadā bahu bhikṣu bhikṣuṇi prayuktamanāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3882: akṛṣṭā anupta tada oṣadhayo prādurbhūtā marutparicarāḥ // SRS_29.35 //
T02bsu034_u:3883: kāṣāya tricīvara prādurbhūtā samacchinna susīvita te 'nupamāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3884: amalā virajāśca suvarṇacittā buddhasya guṇocita puṇyabalāḥ // SRS_29.36 //
T02bsu034_u:3885: paśyo kumāra sa hi rājavaro vijahitva sarva mahi pravrajitaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3886: bheṣyanti sattva kṣayakāli bahu aparīttabhogā na tyajanti gṛhān //
T02bsu034_u:3887: tāḍana bandhana kudaṇḍa bahu ākrośa tarjanamaniṣṭadukham /
T02bsu034_u:3888: sahiṣyanti rājakula pīḍa bahu suparīttabhoga na ca bhaktu gṛhe //
T02bsu034_u:3889: aparītta āyu na ca asti dhanaṃ sumahān pramādu na ca puṇyabalam /
T02bsu034_u:3890: na ca śilpasthānakuśalā abudhā dāridriyaṃ ca na ca vittu gṛhe // SRS_29.39
T02bsu034_u:3892: saṃkliṣṭadharma na ca vṛttu sthitā vakṣyanti buddha bhaviṣyām vayam //
T02bsu034_u:3893: utkocavañcanaka sāhasikā ahamāḍhyu dharma dhanadāsmi jage /
T02bsu034_u:3894: upaghātakāḥ kuhaka naikṛtikā vakṣyanti buddha bhaviṣyāma vayam //
T02bsu034_u:3895: vadhabandhupadravi parasya ratāḥ duḥśīla dāruṇa praduṣṭamanāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3896: akṛtajña bhedaka vihiṃsasthitā vakṣyanti haṃ te bhaṇa bodhicarim //
T02bsu034_u:3897: yasyaiva tena śruta bodhicarī tasyaiva madhyi pratighaṃ janayī /
T02bsu034_u:3899: śrutvā ca budhaṃ skhalitamekapadaṃ tasyaiva bhāṣati avarṇaśatān //
T02bsu034_u:3900: tadimāṃ kumāra mama śrutva giraṃ mā tehi saṃstavu karohi tadā /
T02bsu034_u:3901: supināntare 'pi aviśvasta siyā yadi icchase spṛśitu bodhicarīm //
T02bsu034_u:3903: bhaṇatī guṇānna ca guṇeṣu sthito na sa budhyate paramabodhigirām //
T02bsu034_u:3904: bhavathā sadāpi akhilā madhurā sada śuddhaśīla suprasannamanāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3905: pariśuddhaśīla bhavathā satataṃ nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram //
T02bsu034_u:3906: na karotha māna na janetha khilaṃ pariśuddhamānasa sadā bhavathā /
T02bsu034_u:3907: mada māna mrakṣa vijahitva tataḥ pratilapsyathā imu samādhivaram //
T02bsu034_u:3909: gaganaṃ ca rātriya nakṣatrasphuṭaṃ tatha kāyu lakṣaṇasphuṭo munino //
T02bsu034_u:3911: pūjāṃ karotha sugatasya sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.49
T02bsu034_u:3912: vara gandhamālyakusumā rucirāṃ vāditra tūrya pragṛhīta bahu /
T02bsu034_u:3914: jinastūpi pūja prakarotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram //
T02bsu034_u:3918: prāsādikāṃ paramasudarśanīyāṃ nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.52
T02bsu034_u:3919: vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
T02bsu034_u:3920: advitīya khaṅgasama bhotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram //
T02bsu034_u:3921: ahu dharmasvāmi mama yūyu sutā anuśikṣathā mama samādhicarim /
T02bsu034_u:3922: ahu so abhūṣi diśatā suviśruto dṛḍhadattu nāma manujādhipatiḥ // SRS_29.54
T02bsu034_u:3923: maya buddha pūjita ananta pure maya śīlu rakṣitu viśuddhamanāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3924: maya gauravaṃ daśabaleṣu kṛtaṃ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.55
T02bsu034_u:3925: maya putra dāra parityakta pure śirahastapādanayanāgravarāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3926: na ca līnacittata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.56 //
T02bsu034_u:3928: dhanadhānya dāsa bahudāsiśatā ratanā prabhūta parityakta mayā /
T02bsu034_u:3929: saṃtarpitā pi bahuyācanakā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.57 //
T02bsu034_u:3930: maya mukti sphāṭika suvarṇa bahu vaidūrya śaṅkha śila tyakta pure /
T02bsu034_u:3931: maṇi śuddharūpiya pravāla ghanā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.58
T02bsu034_u:3932: maya tyakta ābharaṇa nānavidhā varamuktahāra tatha sīhanukāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3933: ratanāna jālika viśiṣṭa pṛthu imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.59 //
T02bsu034_u:3934: maya vastrakoṭya paramā sukhumāḥ pariśuddha kāśikadukūlavarāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3935: bahuhemacitra parityakta pare imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.60 //
T02bsu034_u:3936: maya hasti aśva ratha nānavidhāḥ parityakta svapriyasuto mahilāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3937: na ca daurmanasyata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.61
T02bsu034_u:3938: maya dṛṣṭva pūrvi sudaridra narāḥ paryeṣṭiduḥkhita ca kṛcchragatāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3939: maya te dhanena adaridra kṛtāḥ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.62
T02bsu034_u:3941: dattā mayā yācanakāna purā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.63 //
T02bsu034_u:3942: udyāna koṭinayutā bahavaḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
T02bsu034_u:3944: harṣetva mānasu janitva kṛpāṃ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.64 //
T02bsu034_u:3945: grāmātha rāṣṭranagarā nigamāḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
T02bsu034_u:3946: datvā ca prītimanubhomi sadā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.65 //
T02bsu034_u:3948: ye datta pūrvi maya yācanake imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.66 //
T02bsu034_u:3949: sudaridra sattva kṛta āḍhya mayā parikṛcchraprāpta paritrāta bahu /
T02bsu034_u:3950: bahuduḥkhapadruta sukhī mi kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.67
T02bsu034_u:3951: yada āsi īścaru mahīya ahaṃ dukhitāṃ ca paśyami bahuṃ janatām /
T02bsu034_u:3952: utsṛṣṭa teṣu maya rājyamabhūt kṛpa saṃjanetva sukhito ca yathā //
T02bsu034_u:3953: ye me kumāra kṛta āścariyā kṛta duṣkarāṇi bahu kalpaśatā /
T02bsu034_u:3954: na ca te maya kṣapaṇa śakya siyā kalpāna koṭinayutā bhaṇataḥ // SRS_29.69
T02bsu034_u:3957: kṛta ye mi duṣkara tadāścariyā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.70
T02bsu034_u:3958: ārocayāmi ca kumāra idaṃ śraddadhanta me avitathaṃ vacanam /
T02bsu034_u:3959: na hi vāca bhāṣati mṛṣāṃ sugataḥ sada satyavādi jinu kāruṇikaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:3961: anye ime 'pi ca prakāra bahū caratā śodhita ya kalpaśatāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:3962: kathamahaṃ labhitvimu samādhivaraṃ moceya sattvaniyutāṃ dukhitām //
T02bsu034_u:3963: yasmin kṣaṇe ayu samādhi mayā pratilabdha bhūta mahājñānapathaḥ /

T02bsu034_u:4447: kṛtajñāḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ yeṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam // SRS_32.133 //
T02bsu034_u:4449: yairitaḥ sūtraśreṣṭhāto dhṛtā gāthā catuṣpadā // SRS_32.134 //
T02bsu034_u:4451: kṣipraṃ ca bodhiṃ prāpsyanti teṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam // SRS_32.135 //
T02bsu034_u:4452: na teṣāṃ kāṅkṣa vimatī sarvadharmeṣu bheṣyatī /
T02bsu034_u:4453: āsannā nirvṛtisteṣāṃ yeṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam // SRS_32.136 //
T02bsu034_u:4455: sarve vyākṛtu buddhena drakṣyanti maitrakaṃ jinam // SRS_32.137 //
T02bsu034_u:4456: dṛṣṭvā maitreya saṃbuddhaṃ lapsyante kṣānti bhadrikām /
T02bsu034_u:4457: ye keci kṣayakālasminniha sūtre pratiṣṭhitāḥ // SRS_32.138 //
T02bsu034_u:4459: acintiyāyāṃ koṭīye kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate // SRS_32.139 //
T02bsu034_u:4460: na teṣāṃ vidyate kāṅkṣā aṇūmātrāpi sarvaśaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4461: aṇūmātre prahīṇesmin bodhisteṣāṃ na durlabhā // SRS_32.140 //
T02bsu034_u:4464: idaṃ sūtraṃ priyaṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ gañjarakṣakāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4469: teṣāṃ kāyagatā ete kṣayakāle pravartiṣu // SRS_32.144 //
T02bsu034_u:4470: te te nādaṃ nadiṣyanti buddhānāṃ kṣetrakoṭiṣu /
T02bsu034_u:4471: saṃmukhaṃ lokanāthānāṃ śākyasiṃhasya yā carī // SRS_32.145 //
T02bsu034_u:4476: ye rakṣiṣyantimāṃ bodhiṃ kṣayakāle mahābhaye // SRS_32.147 //
T02bsu034_u:4477: te te rūpeṇa saṃpannā lakṣaṇehi vicitritāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4484: niścarī romakūpebhyo yathā gaṅgāya vālikāḥ // SRS_32.151 //
T02bsu034_u:4485: ye ca śṛṇvanti taṃ śabdaṃ sattvakoṭyo acintiyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4488: acintiyeṣu kṣetreṣu teṣāṃ śabdaḥ śruṇīyati // SRS_32.153 //
T02bsu034_u:4489: ye ca śṛṇvanti taṃ śabdaṃ teṣāṃ saṃjñā nirudhyate /
T02bsu034_u:4493: guṇānuśaṃsā ityete yā labhante ha paṇḍitāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4494: anye aparimāṇāśca yairiyaṃ bodhi dhāritā // SRS_32.156 //
T02bsu034_u:4496: vivartayitvā strībhāvaṃ sa bhaved dharmabhāṇakaḥ // SRS_32.157 //
T02bsu034_u:4497: na sā puno 'pi strībhāvamitaḥ paścād grahīṣyati /
T02bsu034_u:4498: bhavet prāsādiko nityaṃ lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ // SRS_32.158 //
T02bsu034_u:4499: śreṣṭhe 'tha iha sūtrasmin guṇāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4500: te 'sya sarve bhaviṣyanti kṣipraṃ bodhiṃ ca prāpsyate // SRS_32.159 //
T02bsu034_u:4501: viśāradaśca so nityaṃ bhoti sarvāsu jātiṣu /
T02bsu034_u:4502: dhārayitvā idaṃ sūtraṃ bodhisattvāna gocaram // SRS_32.160 //
T02bsu034_u:4504: ya icched buddhituṃ bodhimidaṃ sūtraṃ pravartayet // SRS_32.161 //
T02bsu034_u:4507: lapsyanti nacireṇemāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntāṃ samāhitāḥ // SRS_32.162 //
T02bsu034_u:4508: iha bodhīya te śūrā bodhisattvāḥ sthitāḥ sadā /
T02bsu034_u:4509: paśyanti buddhakoṭīyo yathā gaṅgāya vālikāḥ // SRS_32.163 //
T02bsu034_u:4510: rājā bhavitvā mahīpati cakravartī dṛṣṭvā ca buddhān virajān suśāntacittān /
T02bsu034_u:4511: gāthāśataistāṃ staviṣyati lokanāthān sa labhitva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.164
T02bsu034_u:4512: so pūja kṛtva atuliya nāyakānāṃ sumahāyaśānāṃ devanarottamānām /
T02bsu034_u:4513: muktvā sa rājyaṃ yathariva kheṭapiṇḍaṃ śuddho viśuddhaścariṣyati brahmacaryam // SRS_32.165
T02bsu034_u:4514: sa pravrajitva jinavaraśāsanasmiṃ labdhvāpi caitaṃ viraju samādhi śāntam /
T02bsu034_u:4515: kalyāṇavākyo madhuragiraḥ sa bhūtvā adhiṣṭhānu dhīmān bhaviṣyati sūtrakoṭyāḥ // SRS_32.166
T02bsu034_u:4516: śūnyānimittaṃ paramapraṇītu śāntaṃ dharma praśāntaṃ cara nipuṇaṃ asaṅgam /
T02bsu034_u:4517: svabhāvaśūnyaṃ sada virajaṃ praśāntaṃ samādhiprāptyā bahu jani saṃprakāśayī // SRS_32.167
T02bsu034_u:4519: gambhīra śāntaṃ labhiya imaṃ samādhimālokaprāpto bhaviṣyati sarvalokaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:4520: śuciśca nityaṃ bhaviṣyati brahmacārī sa nirāmagandhaḥ satatamasaṃkiliṣṭaḥ
T02bsu034_u:4521: anyāṃśca tatra sthapiṣyati sattvakoṭayo labdhvā praśāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.169
T02bsu034_u:4524: kalyāṇavākyo matikuśalo vidhijño dhāritva śāntiṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:4526: ye karmasthānā tathariva śilpasthānā bhaiṣajyasthānāstathariva auṣadhīnām
T02bsu034_u:4527: sarvatra dhīro bhaviṣyati pāraprāpto dhāritva sūtraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim
T02bsu034_u:4528: kāvyeṣu śāstreṣu tathapi ca hāsyalāsye nṛtye 'tha gīte sukuśala pāraprāptaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4529: ācāryu loke bhaviṣyati nityakālaṃ dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:4530: parivāravān so bhaviṣyati nityakālaṃ sa abhedyapakṣaḥ sada sahitaḥ samagraḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4531: caramāṇu śreṣṭhāṃ varāṃ śiva bodhicaryāṃ dhāritva sūtraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.173
T02bsu034_u:4532: śokātha śalyā tathariva cittapīḍā no tasya jātu bhaviṣyati paṇḍitasya /
T02bsu034_u:4533: ārogyaprāpto bhaviṣyati sarvakālaṃ dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:4534: ye kāyaśūlāstathariva cittaśūlāḥ ye dantaśūlāstathapi ca śīrṣaśūlāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4535: no tasya bhontī vyādhayu jīvaloke dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:4536: yāvanta rogā bahuvidha martaloke ye kāyarogāstathariva cittarogāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4537: te tasya rogāḥ satata na jātu bhonti dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim
T02bsu034_u:4538: cittasya vā ye bahuvidhu yatkileśāḥ kāye vāpi bahuvidha rogajātāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4539: te tasya nāstī bahuvidha saṃkileśā dhāritva śāntaṃ imu viraja samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:4540: yathantarīkṣaṃ gaganamanopaliptaṃ prakṛtiviśuddhaṃ vimala prabhāsvaraṃ ca
T02bsu034_u:4542: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati viśuddha tasyo dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.178
T02bsu034_u:4543: candrasya ābhā tathariva sūryaābhā śuddhā agrāhyā bhavati prabhāsvarāśca /
T02bsu034_u:4544: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati prabhāsvaraṃ ca dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.179
T02bsu034_u:4545: yatha antarīkṣaṃ na sukaru citraṇāya raṅgān gṛhītvā bahuvidha naikarūpān /
T02bsu034_u:4546: cittaṃ tathaiva na sukaru citrituṃ sevetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:4547: vāto yathaiva caturdiśa vāyamāno asajjamāno vrajati diśaḥ samantāt /
T02bsu034_u:4548: vātasamānā bhavati sa cittadhārā jagi so asakto vrajati anopaliptaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:4549: jālena śakyaṃ gṛhṇitu vāyamānaḥ pāśena cāpī bandhitu śakya vātaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4550: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru vijānanāya bhāvetva śāntamimu virajaṃ samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:4551: pratibhāsu śakyaṃ jalagata gṛhṇanāya saṃprāptu toyaṃ tathapi ca tailapātre
T02bsu034_u:4552: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru vijānanāya bhāvetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:4553: garjanti meghā vidyulatā carantā śakyaṃ grahītu pāṇina mānuṣeṇa /
T02bsu034_u:4554: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru pramāṇu jñātuṃ bhāvetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.184
T02bsu034_u:4555: sattvāna śakyaṃ rūtaravitaṃ grahītuṃ ye santi sattvā daśadiśi buddhakṣetra
T02bsu034_u:4556: cittasya tasyo na sukaru jñātu koṭiṃ samādhilabdho yada bhavi bodhisattvaḥ
T02bsu034_u:4558: so tāṃ labhitva virajaṃ samādhibhūmiṃ asaṃṃkiliṣṭo bhavati anopaliptaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4559: no tasya bhūyo tribhavi niveśa jātu anena labdho bhavati samādhi śāntaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:4560: no kāmalolo na ca puna rūpalolo na istrilolo na ca puna bhrāntacittaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4561: śāntaḥ praśānto bhavati anopalipto yada bhoti labdho ayu virajaḥ samādhiḥ
T02bsu034_u:4562: na putralolo na ca puna dhītalolo no bhāryalolo na ca parivāralolaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4563: suśāntacārī bhavati anopalipto yada bhoti labdho ayu virajaḥ samādhiḥ //
T02bsu034_u:4564: na hiraṇyalolo na ca punararthalolo na svargalolo dhanarataneṣvasaktaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4565: suviśuddhacitto bhavati sa nirvikalpaḥ samādhiprāpto ayu bhavatī viśeṣaḥ // SRS_32.189
T02bsu034_u:4566: na svargahetoścarati sa brahmacaryaṃ na svargalolo dadati sadā nu vijñaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4569: no rājyahetoścarati tapo vrataṃ vā naiśvaryamarthāstribhuvani prārthamānaḥ
T02bsu034_u:4570: saṃbodhilolo bahujanahitāya niṣpādayī so imu virajaṃ samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:4571: no tasya rāgo janayati jātu pīḍāṃ yo na strīlolo so bhavati bhrāntacittaḥ
T02bsu034_u:4572: tathāpi tena prakṛtiprajñāya rāgo labhitva etaṃ viraju samādhi śāntam //
T02bsu034_u:4573: no tasya doṣo janayati jātu pīḍāṃ vyāpādu yeno pratighamatho kareyya /
T02bsu034_u:4575: maitrāya teno nihata sa doṣadhātu pratilabhya etaṃ viraju samādhi śāntam
T02bsu034_u:4576: no tasya moho janayati jātu pīḍāṃ prajñāya teno nihata sa moha avidyā /
T02bsu034_u:4577: taṃ jñānu labdhaṃ vitimiramaprameyaṃ samādhiprāpte imi guṇa aprameyāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:4578: aśubhāya rāgaḥ satata sunigṛhīto maitryāya doṣo nihatu sadā aśeṣaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4579: prajñāya moho vidhamiya kleśajālaṃ samādhiprāptaḥ pratapati sarvaloke //
T02bsu034_u:4580: no tasya middhaṃ janayati jātu pīḍāṃ subhāvitā se vividha utkileśāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4581: anopalipto bhavati ca vipramuktaḥ samādhiprāpte imi guṇa aprameyāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:4582: no tasya moho janayati jātu pīḍāṃ tathā hi tyāge abhiratu nityakālam /
T02bsu034_u:4583: sarvasvatyāgī bhavati sukhasya dātā ya imaṃ samādhiṃ dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.197
T02bsu034_u:4584: sthāmenupeto bhavati anopameyo sa balenupeto bhavati nityakālam /
T02bsu034_u:4585: no tasya loke bhavati samaḥ kadācid ya imaṃ samādhiṃ dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.198
T02bsu034_u:4586: yadāpi rājā sa bhavati cakravartīṃ manujānu loke upagata jambudvīpe /
T02bsu034_u:4587: tadāpi bhotī bahujanapūjanīyo viśeṣaprāpto matima viśiṣṭaprajñaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:4588: ye bhonti mukhyāḥ kularatanā viśiṣṭāḥ suprabhūtabhogā bahujanasvāpateyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4589: yatrāśva hastī rathavara yugyayānā hiraṇyasvarṇaṃ maṇīratanaṃ prabhūtam //
T02bsu034_u:4591: ye śrāddha bhontī iha varabuddhajñāne te jambudvīpe kularatanābhiyuktāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4592: tatropapannaḥ kularatane viśiṣṭe karoti so 'rthaṃ suvipula jñātisaṃghe //
T02bsu034_u:4593: aśrāddha ye vā iha kula jambudvipe śraddhāṃ sa teṣāṃ janayati apramattaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4594: yaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhiti sattvakāye te buddha bhontī jinapravaraḥ svayaṃbhūḥ // SRS_32.202
T02bsu034_u:4595: te ca spṛśitva atuliyamagrabodhiṃ cakraṃ pravartentyasadṛśa buddhakṣetre /
T02bsu034_u:4596: ye co vijānī imu tada dharmacakraṃ anutpattidharme nikhila te saṃpratiṣṭhī
T02bsu034_u:4597: subahukarāśco ami tada bodhisattvāḥ sattvāna bhonti satatu te pūjanīyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4598: karonti te 'rthaṃ atuliya nityakālaṃ sattvāna cakṣurvitimiru te janenti //
T02bsu034_u:4599: bahava śatasahasrāḥ sattvakoṭī anantā yeṣa kuśalamūlā bhonti tatra śruṇitvā /
T02bsu034_u:4600: te api pratilabhante uttamaṃ bodhicittaṃ yada jinu anuśāsī bodhisattvaṃ mahātmā // SRS_32.205
T02bsu034_u:4601: aśūnyakṣetrā pramudita bhonti nityaṃ nirupalepā ami tada buddha bhontī /
T02bsu034_u:4602: yatra sthihantī imi tada bodhisattvāḥ sattvānamartha aparimitaṃ karonti //
T02bsu034_u:4603: rakṣanti śīlaṃ asadṛśu brahmacaryaṃ bhāvī samādhī vipulamanantakalpān /
T02bsu034_u:4604: dhyāne vimokṣe suniśrita nityakālaṃ te bodhisattvā bhavi sada buddhaputrāḥ
T02bsu034_u:4605: te ṛddhipādān satat niṣevamāṇā kṣetrāṇi gatvā bahu vividhānanantān /
T02bsu034_u:4607: śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ sugatavaraprabhāṣaṃ sarvaṃ ca gṛhṇī pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye // SRS_32.208
T02bsu034_u:4608: prabhāṣi sūtrānaparimitānanantān ye dhāraṇīye pratiṣṭhitu bodhisattvāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4609: sattvāna arthaṃ aparimitaṃ karonti ye dhāraṇīye pratiṣṭhitu bodhisattvāḥ // SRS_32.209
T02bsu034_u:4611: yādṛśaṃ taiḥ kṛtaṃ karma vipāko 'pi ca tādṛśaḥ // SRS_32.210 //
T02bsu034_u:4613: te 'pi teṣāṃ vijānanti bodhisattvā mahāyaśāḥ // SRS_32.211 //
T02bsu034_u:4614: śūnyatā ca mahātmānāṃ vihāro bhoti uttamaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4617: apravṛttiṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvāḥ prakāśayī // SRS_32.213 //
T02bsu034_u:4621: na teṣāṃ vartate saṃjñā istrisaṃjñā svabhāvatā // SRS_32.215 //
T02bsu034_u:4624: na cātra paśyate māraṃ mārasainyaṃ ca paṇḍitaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4625: na ca paśyati mārasya tisro duhitaro 'pi saḥ // SRS_32.217 //
T02bsu034_u:4628: sumeravaḥ samudrāśca yāva santi daśā diśe /
T02bsu034_u:4629: taṃ ca sattvā vijānanti sarvadikṣu daśasvapi // SRS_32.219 //
T02bsu034_u:4631: ṣaḍvikāraṃ tadā kāle budhyato bodhimuttamām // SRS_32.220 //
T02bsu034_u:4632: yāvantaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmā ye ca dharmā asaṃskṛtāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4633: sarvāṃstān budhyate dharmān dharmaśabdena deśitān // SRS_32.221 //
T02bsu034_u:4635: na cātra budhyate kaścit siṃhanādaśca vartate /
T02bsu034_u:4636: vartanīyaṃ vijānitvā bhoti buddhaḥ prabhākaraḥ // SRS_32.222 //
T02bsu034_u:4637: pratītya dharmā vartante utpadyante pratītya ca /
T02bsu034_u:4638: pratītyatāṃ yaddharmāṇāṃ sarve jānanti te viduḥ // SRS_32.223 //
T02bsu034_u:4640: gatiṃ ca te prajānanti sarvadharmagatiṃgatāḥ // SRS_32.224 //
T02bsu034_u:4643: sa tāṃ gatiṃ gato bhoti yaḥ sarvāṃ gati jānati /
T02bsu034_u:4644: sarvasya māyā ucchinnā jñātvā saddharmalakṣaṇam // SRS_32.226 //
T02bsu034_u:4648: yatha vainayikān sattvān vinetī sattvasārathiḥ // SRS_32.228 //
T02bsu034_u:4657: janetha gauravaṃ buddhe dharme saṃghe guṇottame /
T02bsu034_u:4660: bhaviṣyatha tato buddhā nacireṇa prabhākarāḥ // SRS_32.234 //
T02bsu034_u:4667: ratnajālena cchādenti samantena diśo daśa // SRS_32.237 //
T02bsu034_u:4676: te ca sarve spharitvāna gandhavarṣaṃ pravarṣiṣuḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4677: ye ca ghrāyanti taṃ gandhaṃ te buddhā bhonti nāyakāḥ // SRS_32.242 //
T02bsu034_u:4679: vidhvaṃsitaṃ mohajālaṃ tamaḥ sarvaṃ vigacchati // SRS_32.243 //
T02bsu034_u:4680: ṛddhiṃ ca tatra sparśenti balabodhyaṅga indriyān /
T02bsu034_u:4681: dhyānavimokṣān sparśenti bhonti co dakṣiṇārhāḥ // SRS_32.244 //
T02bsu034_u:4688: pānīyaṃ te tataḥ pītvā puṣkariṇītaṭe sthitāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4689: sarve tṛṣṇāṃ vinoditvā bhonti lokasya cetiyāḥ // SRS_32.248 //
T02bsu034_u:4691: buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante śākyasiṃhasya tāyinaḥ // SRS_32.249 //
T02bsu034_u:4692: śṛṇvanti ye ca taṃ varṇaṃ te bhontī lokanāyakāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4693: acintyā anuśaṃsā me iha sūtre prakāśitāḥ // SRS_32.250 //
T02bsu034_u:4697: vaiḍūryasya ca daṇḍāni sphaṭikasya ca pañjarāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:4699: ye ca ghrāyanti taṃ gandhaṃ niścarantaṃ manoramam /
T02bsu034_u:4700: teṣāṃ sarve praśāmyanti vyādhayaḥ prītacetasām // SRS_32.253 //
T02bsu034_u:4702: trīn doṣān kṣapayitvā ca bhonti buddhā sukhaṃdadāḥ // SRS_32.254 //

T02bsu034_u:4773: sarve ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan anācchedyapratibhānāḥ samādhipratilabdhāḥ asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhūtaguṇadharmadeśakāḥ pariśuddhadharmadeśakāḥ bodhisattvavaśipāramiprāptāḥ tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tatraiva parṣadi kṣemadatto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu034_u:4774: kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamayauvanasamanvāgate bhadrake vayasi vartamānaḥ avikrīḍitāvī kāmeṣu kaumārabrahmacārī ekavarṣa upasaṃpadā |
T02bsu034_u:4775: tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rāja śrīghoṣastaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvamahāsattvagaṇamadhyeṣate sma yaduta ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃgītau |
T02bsu034_u:4776: bodhisattvapiṭakamahādhāraṇyupāyakauśalyavaśivinayāsaṅgābhinirhārārthaṃ tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānadhyeṣya rātrau saṃniṣaṇṇāyāṃ tathāgatacaityasya purataḥ tatrānekāni dīpārdhyakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi prajvālitāni |
T02bsu034_u:4781: mahatī ca devamānuṣikā pariṣat saṃnipatitā dharmaśravaṇārthikā |

T02bsu034_u:4784: sadevamānuṣikāṃ ca janatāṃ dharmaśravaṇāya saṃnipatitāṃ viditvā tasyaitadabhūt - ahamapi mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ
T02bsu034_u:4785: yannvahamimaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣastathāgatapūjāṃ kuryām,yathārūpayā pūjayā sadevamānuṣāsuralokaścitrīkāraprāpto bhavedāttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhaveddharmālokaprāptaḥ |

T02bsu034_u:4789: atha khalu kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paryeṣamāṇasya tathā pradīpte dakṣiṇe pāṇau nābhūt cittasya mukhavarṇasya vā anyathātvam |
T02bsu034_u:4790: atha khalu kumāraḥ samanantarapradīpte kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāṇau saṃprajvalite saṃjyotībhūte ekajvālāprāpte, atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ prādurabhūt |

T02bsu034_u:4907: ye bhogapratilābhāḥ sarvalokopajīvyā bhaveyustairme bhogapratilābhaiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhavet, evamidaṃ kuśalamūlavaropayāmi |

T02bsu034_u:4913: yo 'sya samādherdhārako bhikṣurbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavet,sa ca syādābādhiko bāḍhaglānaḥ, tena svamāṃsaśoṇiatenāpi sa bhikṣustasmādābādhād vyutthāpayitumutsoḍhavyaḥ |

T02bsu034_u:4927: īdṛśānāṃ ca sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pīḍāṃ kurvanto yāvajjīvitād vyavaropaṇamakārṣuḥ
T02bsu034_u:4929: tena ca punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena rājābhūd jñānabalo nāma jambudvīpeśvaraḥ saddharmaparigrāhakaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānasaṃpannaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:4930: tena khalu punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena iha jambudvīpe eko bhikṣurdharmabhāṇako 'bhūt tasya samādherdhārako bhūtamatirnāmnā tasya rājñaḥ kulapraveśakaḥ kalyāṇamitro hitaiṣī anukampakaḥ arthakāmaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:4931: sa cāsya rājā atṛpto darśanenābhīkṣṇapratikāṅkṣī cābhūddarśanena
T02bsu034_u:4934: sattvānāmindriyabalavīryavimātratājñānadhātuvāsanākuśalaḥ satyasaṃdhikuśalaḥ visaṃdhiprativacanakuśalaḥ arthaviniścayakuśalaḥ gambhīrapratibhānaḥ sattvānāṃ vinayavidhijñaḥ pūrvābhilāpī smitamukhaḥ apagatabhrūkuṭimukho mahadgatacittavihārī mahākarūṇābhiyuktaḥ anabhibhūtaḥ sarvaparapravādibhiḥ tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rājño jñānabalasya duhitā dārikābhūt ṣoḍaśavarṣā jātyā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā jñānāvatī nāma |
T02bsu034_u:4935: tasyāḥ sa bhūtamatirbhikṣurācāryo 'bhūt kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu saṃdarśakaḥ
T02bsu034_u:4937: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣormahākṛṣṇavaisarpaḥ ūrau prādurabhūt duścikitsyo durlabhabhaiṣajyaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:4939: atha khalu rājā sāntapuraḥ saputraḥ saduhitṛparivāraḥ taṃ bhikṣuṃ glānaṃ viditvā prārodīdaśrūṇi pravartayati sma sārdhamaśītyā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ paurairnāgaraiḥ sārdhaṃ rāṣṭreṇa naigamajānapadairgaṇakamahāmātraiḥ sārdhamamātyadauvārikapāriṣadyaiḥ |
T02bsu034_u:4940: te sarve taṃ bhikṣuṃ glānaṃ viditvā prarodantaḥ aśraṇi pravartayāmāsuḥ - mā khalvayaṃ bhikṣuḥ kālaṃ kuryāditi |
T02bsu034_u:4941: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājño jñānabalasyānyatarā devatā purāṇasālohitābhūdanubaddhā
T02bsu034_u:4942: sā tasya rājñaḥ svapnāntargatasyāpadarśayati sma - sacet mahārāja etasya
T02bsu034_u:4944: navakaṃ cāsaṃkliṣṭaṃ mānuṣaṃ māsaṃ nānārasasaṃprayuktaṃ bhojanaṃ dīyeta,
T02bsu034_u:4946: atha khalu rājā jñānabalastasyā rātryā atyayena tataḥ svapnāntarāt prativibuddho 'ntaḥpuramadhyagataḥ imāṃ svapnaprakṛtimantaḥpurāyārocayāmāsa - evaṃrūpaḥ svapno mayā dṛṣṭaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:4947: iti hi kumāra tataḥ stryāgārāttataśca rājakulānna kācit strī utsahate tasya
T02bsu034_u:4950: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prativibuddhā antaḥpuramadhye imāmeva svapnaprakṛtiṃ mātṝṇāṃ parivārasya cārocayati sma |
T02bsu034_u:4951: na ca kācidutsahate strī tasya bhikṣoretad bhaiṣajyaṃ dātum ||
T02bsu034_u:4952: atha khalu jñānavatī rājaduhitā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā evaṃ vyavasāyamakārṣīt - yannvahametad bhaiṣajyaṃ svakāccharīrād yathopadiṣṭaṃ navaṃ rudhiraṃ navaṃ ca māṃsaṃ dadyām |
T02bsu034_u:4953: ahameveha rājakule sarvadaharā ca sarvataruṇī ca asaṃkliṣṭakāyavāṅbhanaskarmā ca |
T02bsu034_u:4954: asaṃkliṣṭaṃ jñānameṣāmi asaṃkliṣṭasya dharmabhāṇakasya svaśarīrāda rudhiraṃ ca māṃsaṃ copanāmayiṣyāmi
T02bsu034_u:4956: atha khalu sā jñānavatī rājaduhitā svakamāvāsaṃ gatvā tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dharmāntargatena mānasena svakamūrumāṃsaṃ chittvā nānārasasaṃprayuktaṃ praṇītamabhisaṃskṛtya lohitaṃ ca pragṛhya taṃ cācāryaṃ praveśya rājño jñānabalasya purato niṣadya lohitena taṃ visarpamālepayitvā tena ca svabhisaṃskṛtena bhojanena saṃtarpayati |
T02bsu034_u:4957: atha khalu sa bhikṣurajānannaparibudhyamānaḥ apariśaṅkamānastadbhaktaṃ paribhuktavān |
T02bsu034_u:4958: samanantaraparibhukte ca tasminnāhāre tasya bhikṣoḥ sarvāstā vedanā
T02bsu034_u:4960: tena vigataparidāhena sarvasukhasamarpitena tathā dharmo deśito yathā tato 'ntaḥpurāttataśca
T02bsu034_u:4962: atha khalu rājā jñānabalaḥ svakāṃ duhitaraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:4963: kutastvayā śoṇitu labdhu dārike kuto idaṃ āhṛtu māṃsa mānuṣam /
T02bsu034_u:4964: āhāru yaḥ sādhitu te 'dya dhīte yeno sukhīyaṃ kṛtu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:4965: hato hyayaṃ vātha mṛto 'tha labdho yat sādhitaṃ nānarasehi vyañjanam /
T02bsu034_u:4966: kutaśca te śoṇitu labdhu dārike yeno ayaṃ mocitu vyādhi pāpakaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:4967: pituḥ śruṇitvā vacanaṃ ca dārikā jñānāvatī tasya idaṃ bravīti /
T02bsu034_u:4968: alīnacittā ca giraṃ prabhāṣate śṛṇuṣva tātā yadahaṃ bravīmi te // SRS_34.3
T02bsu034_u:4970: śṛṇuṣva me bhūmipate bhūtamarthaṃ vijānatha // SRS_34.4 //
T02bsu034_u:4973: yo dadyādasya bhikṣusya vyādhermucyet sa pāpakāt // SRS_34.5 //
T02bsu034_u:4977: mānuṣaṃ śoṇitaṃ māṃsaṃ rasasiddhaṃ susaṃskṛtam // SRS_34.7 //
T02bsu034_u:4978: bhojanaṃ ca pradātavyaṃ śoṇitena ca lepanam /
T02bsu034_u:4980: yadi kriyā na kriyate kṣiprametena vyādhinā /
T02bsu034_u:4981: kālaṃ kuryādayaṃ bhikṣurbhaiṣajyena vineti vā // SRS_34.9 //
T02bsu034_u:4983: imaṃ dṛṣṭvā na ko vidvān kuryāt kāyasmi niśrayam // SRS_34.10 //
T02bsu034_u:4984: antaḥpurasyo prativedayāmyahaṃ na eka nārīpi bhaṇāti dāsye /
T02bsu034_u:4985: priyaśca me bhikṣuḥ priyaśca ātmā bodhyarthu tyaktaṃ maya māṃsaśoṇitam //
T02bsu034_u:4986: teṣāṃ na kāyesmi ca bhakti niśritā premāpi naivātmani cāṇumātram /
T02bsu034_u:4987: tyaktvāpi cātmānu na bhoti durmanāḥ ye bodhi prārthenti śivāmaśokām //
T02bsu034_u:4988: antaḥpuraṃ tataḥ śrutvā sarvaṃ tadvismitaṃ abhūt /
T02bsu034_u:4989: na cātrotsahate kācidenāṃ yojayituṃ kriyām // SRS_34.13 //
T02bsu034_u:4990: tato me nāmitaṃ cittaṃ bhikṣordāsyāmi bhojanam /
T02bsu034_u:4991: svāni māṃsānyahaṃ chittvā śoṇitena ca lepanam // SRS_34.14 //
T02bsu034_u:4995: bhojanaṃ mānuṣaṃ māṃsaṃ śoṇitena ca lepanam // SRS_34.16 //
T02bsu034_u:4996: śṛṇohi mahyaṃ vacanaṃ narādhipā manuṣyamāṃsasmi avidyamāne /
T02bsu034_u:4998: chittvā svamāṃsāni mayoruto nṛpā sādhetva dattānima dharmabhāṇake //
T02bsu034_u:4999: eṣo mayānuttarabodhi arthe svakātta kāyātta kṛto mahārthaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5000: bhikṣuśca muktaḥ kṛtu nirvikāro mayā ca puṇyaṃ kṛtamaprameyam // SRS_34.18
T02bsu034_u:5001: rājāpyavocadduhitāṃ kathaṃ te chidyanti kāyāttu svakāttu māṃse /
T02bsu034_u:5002: bhaiṣajyayoge kriyamāṇi dārike mā te abhūd duḥkha śarīravedanā //
T02bsu034_u:5003: sa rājadhītā matimān viśāradā tamālapī rāja śṛṇu narādhipā /
T02bsu034_u:5004: śrutvā ca tatra pratipadya yoniśo acintiyaḥ karmavipāku tādṛśaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5005: pāpena karmeṇa kṛtena tātā niraye 'pi sattvā prapacanti dāruṇe /
T02bsu034_u:5006: nirmāṃsa bhūtvā ca samāṃsa bhonti paśyetu karmāṇa phalaṃ acintiyam //
T02bsu034_u:5007: pāpena karmeṇa nirmāṃsaśoṇitāḥ kṣaṇena co bhonti samāṃsaśoṇitāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5008: kiṃ vā punā tat kuśalena karmaṇā adhimuktito jāyati māṃsaśoṇitam //
T02bsu034_u:5009: chidyanti māṃse na mamāsi vedanā āhāri me śoṇitu nāsti iñjanā /
T02bsu034_u:5010: na dharmakāyasya vraṇo na chidraṃ yadi sarvu chidyeyu mama svamāṃsam //
T02bsu034_u:5011: prītiṃ mayā dharmi parāṃ janitvā chittvā pradattaṃ svakamūrumāṃsam /
T02bsu034_u:5012: na co mamā tāta vraṇena duḥkhaṃ jānāmi kāyo yathapūrvamāsīt // SRS_34.24
T02bsu034_u:5014: audumbaraṃ puṣpu yathaiva tātā bahukalpakoṭīṣu kadāci dṛśyate /
T02bsu034_u:5015: emeva etādṛśa dharmabhāṇako kadāci dṛśyantiha jambudvīpe // SRS_34.25 //
T02bsu034_u:5016: yathaiva jāmbūnada niṣku bhāsate paśyanta sattvā na vitṛptimenti /
T02bsu034_u:5017: emeva etādṛśa dharmabhāṇakān dṛṣṭvā na tṛpyantiha devamānuṣāḥ // SRS_34.26
T02bsu034_u:5018: pītvā yathācchaṃ salilaṃ janasya tṛṣābhibhūtasya tṛṣā vigacchati /
T02bsu034_u:5019: emeva ete vidu dharmabhāṇakā dharmāmṛtaistṛṣṇa vinenti prāṇinām //
T02bsu034_u:5021: visarpu śāntaśca sa dharmabhāṇake kṛtaṃ mayā gauravu buddhavarṇitam //
T02bsu034_u:5023: yanme tu tyaktaṃ svakamātmamāṃsameteṣa dharmāṇa bhaveyya lābhinī //
T02bsu034_u:5024: yathaiva gandhaḥ surabhī manoramaḥ kālānusārī śubha candanasya /
T02bsu034_u:5025: pravāti gandho daśasu diśāsu emeva gandhopama dharmabhāṇakāḥ // SRS_34.30
T02bsu034_u:5027: avabhāsayanto diśatāsu rocate tathaiva merūpama dharmabhāṇakāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5028: yathaiva stūpaṃ patamānu kaścid vyutthāpayet saṃskari paṇḍito naraḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5029: yastatra stūpe 'pi prasādu kuryād vyutthāpito yena sa tasya hetuḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5032: svakena māṃsena ca dharmagauravād dīpo mayā dīpitu jambudvīpe // SRS_34.33
T02bsu034_u:5033: eṣo 'kariṣyad yadi bhikṣu kālaṃ samādhiśabdo 'piha jambudvīpe /
T02bsu034_u:5034: niruddhu sattvāna sadābhaviṣyat cikitsite 'smin sa samādhi labdhaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5035: sarvasya lokasya paritrāṇu bhikṣurandhasya lokasya ca cakṣudāyakaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5036: rāgasya doṣasya mohasya caiva cikitsako 'yaṃ mama vaidyarājaḥ // SRS_34.35
T02bsu034_u:5037: mahadgate citti sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ pramāṇu caryāya na tasya labhyate /
T02bsu034_u:5039: na mahya bhūyo vinipātato bhayaṃ strītvaṃ punarme na ca bhūyu bheṣyati /
T02bsu034_u:5040: sahasrakalpāna ca koṭiyo bhuyo kṛtvā paraṃ gauravu dharmabhāṇake //
T02bsu034_u:5041: yo buddhakṣetrān yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ ratanāna pūrṇān dadi nāyakānām /
T02bsu034_u:5042: yaścaiva pādāṅgulimeka dadyādidaṃ tataḥ puṇyu viśiṣyate param // SRS_34.38
T02bsu034_u:5043: sā dārikā kālamitaśca kṛtvā adrākṣi buddhāna sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5044: sarveṣa co śāsani pravrajitvā imaṃ varaṃ śāntu samādhi deśayī // SRS_34.39
T02bsu034_u:5045: sarveṣa teṣāṃ dvipadottamānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ caramismi kāle /
T02bsu034_u:5048: dīpaprabhasyātha tathāgatasya caritva sā śāsani brahmacaryam /
T02bsu034_u:5049: strībhāvu tasmin vinivartayitvā abhūṣi bhikṣustada dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5050: maitreya jñānaṃbalu so narendraḥ saddharmaparigrāhaku nityakālam /
T02bsu034_u:5051: dīpaṃkaro 'sau abhūddharmabhāṇako ahaṃ ca āsaṃ tada rājadhītā // SRS_34.42
T02bsu034_u:5052: svakena māṃsena ca śoṇitena co upasthito me tada dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5053: śāṭhyaṃ ca sarvaṃ parivarjayitvā imaṃ samādhiṃ pratikāṅkṣatā tadā //
T02bsu034_u:5054: yebhī tadā roditu bhikṣu dṛṣṭvā gilānakaṃ pīḍitu vedanābhiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5055: avivartikāste sada sarvi bhūvan na jātu yātā vinipātabhūmim // SRS_34.44
T02bsu034_u:5056: nābhūṣi teṣāṃ sada akṣirogo na śīrṣarogo na ca karṇarogaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5057: na ghrāṇarogo na ca jihvarogo na ca dantaśūlaṃ na kadācidāsīt // SRS_34.45
T02bsu034_u:5058: samantaprāsādiku bhonti nityaṃ śirīya tejena jvalantakāyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5061: mahyaṃ ca te śāsani pravrajitvā pralujyamānānimu buddhabodhim /
T02bsu034_u:5062: dhāritva te gañju tathāgatānāṃ drakṣyanti buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyo //
T02bsu034_u:5063: susaṃgṛhītvānima buddhabodhiṃ dhāretva nityaṃ ca hi gauraveṇa /
T02bsu034_u:5064: te arthu kṛtvā vipulaṃ prajānāṃ drakṣyanti akṣobhya narāṇamuttamam //
T02bsu034_u:5065: śrutvā ca te carya niruttarāmimāṃ lapsyanti prītiṃ cariyāṃ nirāmiṣām /
T02bsu034_u:5066: śrutvā ca te ātmana pūrvacaryāṃ kāhinti buddhāna udārapūjām // SRS_34.49
T02bsu034_u:5067: dṛṣṭā ca bhikṣūn vidu śīlavanto niḥśāṭhiyeno sada sevitavyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5068: akhilaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca vivarjayitvā seveta bhikṣuṃ tada dharmabhāṇakāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5069: āghātu krodhaṃ ca vivarjayitvā pūjetha putrān mama dharmaśāsane /
T02bsu034_u:5070: mā andhabhūtā bahukalpakoṭiyo vinipātaprāptāśca bhaveta duḥkhitāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5071: na śīlu trāyeta śrataṃ ca tasya na dhyānu trāyenna araṇyavāsaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5072: tadā nu trāyenna ca buddhapūjā vyāpādu kṛtvāna paraspareṇa // SRS_34.52 //
T02bsu034_u:5076: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
T02bsu034_u:5077: samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśaṃ sacenme bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt praṣṭavyapraśnavyākaraṇāya
T02bsu034_u:5078: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - tena hyānanda svake āsane niṣadya pṛccha tvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yad yadevākāṅkṣasi, ahaṃ te tasya tasya praśnasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣye |
T02bsu034_u:5079: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kṛtāvakāśo 'smi bhagavan, kṛtāvakāśo 'smi sugata praśnavyākaraṇāya |
T02bsu034_u:5080: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ purataḥ āsane niṣadya bhagavantametadavocat - ko nu bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadiha ekatyā bodhisattvā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā hastacchedān pādacchedān karṇacchedānakṣyutpāṭanāni aṅgottamāṅgacchedān nigacchanti
T02bsu034_u:5081: pratyaṅgacchedāṃśca? vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti? no ca hīyante?na
T02bsu034_u:5082: ca parikṣīyante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - sacet tvamānanda jānīyā yāni me duḥkhāni pratyanubhūtāni imāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samudānayitum,
T02bsu034_u:5085: tad yathāpi nāma ānanda iha kāścideva puruṣaḥ adhastāt pādatalamupādāya yāvanmūrdhakādādīpto bhavet prajvalitaḥ ekajvālībhūtaḥ,
T02bsu034_u:5086: taṃ kaścideva puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vadet - ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ
T02bsu034_u:5088: tat kiṃ manyase ānanda api tu sa puruṣaḥ anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍeta rameta paricārayeta? ānanda āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan |
T02bsu034_u:5089: bhagavānāha - krīḍetānanda sa puruṣo rameta paricārayeta parikalpamupādāyānirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:5090: na tveva tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇasya sattvāṃstribhirupāyairduḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrānnābhūt sukhaṃ vā saumanasyaṃ vā cittapraharṣo vā |
T02bsu034_u:5091: ye ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā akhaṇḍaśīlā bhavanti achidraśīlāḥ akalmāṣaśīlā aśabalaśīlāḥ aparāmṛṣṭaśīlāḥ acalitaśīlāḥ, alulitaśīlā
T02bsu034_u:5092: akopyaśīlāḥ, nottānaśīlāḥ,na paradarśanaśīlāḥ na visaṃvādaśīlāḥ, ṛjuśīlāḥ yathāpratijñāśīlāḥ sattvānugrahaśīlāḥ |

T02bsu034_u:5420: kāmāndhabhūtena mayādya ghātito yenātikaṣṭaṃ nirayaṃ gamiṣye // SRS_35.101
T02bsu034_u:5421: ye 'tīta buddhāpyatha ye anāgatā ye cāpi tiṣṭhanti narottamā jināḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5422: anantavarṇān guṇasāgaropamān upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5423: ghorān gamiṣye nirayāṃścyutasya trātā na tatra pratividyate mama /
T02bsu034_u:5424: karmaṃ hyaniṣṭaṃ hi kṛtaṃ mayādya yad ghātito 'yaṃ maya dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5425: dhik pāpacittaṃ vyasanasya kartṛ dhig rājabhāvaṃ madagarvitānām /
T02bsu034_u:5426: ekaḥ prayāsyāmi vihāya sarvaṃ sāraṃ na me kiṃcidito gṛhītam // SRS_35.104
T02bsu034_u:5428: adūṣakaḥ sarvajanaikabandhuḥ kasmāddhato me varapuṣpacandraḥ // SRS_35.105
T02bsu034_u:5430: hā niṣkuhā śrīghana niṣprapañcā kuha prayāto 'si vihāya mā tvam //
T02bsu034_u:5431: adyāvagacchāmi maharṣivākyaṃ kāmā hyanityā vadhakāḥ prajānām /
T02bsu034_u:5432: manojvarā durgatihetavaśca tasmāt prahāsye eta kāmacaryām // SRS_35.107 //
T02bsu034_u:5434: yāsye ghoramahaṃ hyavīcinirayaṃ trāṇaṃ na me vidyate pāpaṃ karma kṛtaṃ hyaniṣṭamasukhaṃ bhikṣurmayā ghātitaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5435: muktvā rājya hu brahmacaryaparamaḥ pūjāṃ kariṣye varāṃ puṣpairgandhavilepanaiḥ suruciraiḥ stūpaṃ kariṣyāmyaham // SRS_35.108 //
T02bsu034_u:5436: putrāśco duhitṝḥ striyo gṛhapatī ye cā amātyā mama śreṣṭhī naigama kṣatriyā bahuvidhāḥ sarveṣa bhāṣāmyaham /
T02bsu034_u:5437: agaruṃ padmaku candanaṃ suruciraṃ gandhāśca ye śobhanāḥ śīghraṃ kurvatha mañjugarbhaśibikāṃ yadbhikṣu dhmāpīyatu // SRS_35.109 //
T02bsu034_u:5438: śrutvā pārthivavākya sarvanagaraṃ gandhāṃ haritvā varāṃ citikāṃ kṛtva manojñagandha rucirāmāropya bhikṣuṃ tahim /
T02bsu034_u:5439: agaruṃ padmaku candanaṃ satagaraṃ spṛkkāṃ tathā pāṭalāṃ puṣpairmālyavilepanena ruciraistailena prajvālayī // SRS_35.110 //
T02bsu034_u:5440: droṇyāṃ tasya kṛtaṃ śarīramabhavad yā māpitā bhikṣubhis teṣāṃ stūpu karitva rāja avacī pūjāsya kāmāmyaham /
T02bsu034_u:5441: puṣpaṃ mālya vilepanaṃ ca grahiya cchatrān patākāṃ dhvajāṃs tasmiṃstūryasahasrakoṭinayutāṃ vādāpayī pārthivaḥ // SRS_35.111 //
T02bsu034_u:5442: traikālyaṃ divase vrajī mahipati bhikṣusya stūpaṃ tadā triṣvapyadhvasu deśayī purīmakaṃ yatkiṃci pāpaṃ kṛtam /
T02bsu034_u:5443: varṣā koṭisahasra pañcanavatiṃ taṃ kṣepayī duṣkṛtaṃ śīlaṃ paści akhaṇḍa rakṣitu varaṃ śuddhaṃ śucī nirmalam // SRS_35.112 //
T02bsu034_u:5444: varṣā koṭisahasra pañcanavatiṃ poṣī tadā poṣadhaṃ bhinne co tada ātmabhāvi patito ghorāmavīciṃ punaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5445: kṛtvā nirghṛṇa karma vedayi dukhaṃ kāmaṃnidānaṃ bahu buddhā koṭisahasra pañcanavatiṃ vīrāgitā ye mayā // SRS_35.113 //
T02bsu034_u:5446: varṣā koṭisahasra pañcanavatī andho 'hamāsaṃ tadā dvāṣaṣṭī pi ca kalpa koṭinayutā netrā mi bhinnā purā /
T02bsu034_u:5447: naikā kalpasahasra koṭinayutāmutpāṭya cakṣurhṛtaṃ hastā cchinna anantakalpanayutān pādāśca karṇāḥ śirāḥ // SRS_35.114 //
T02bsu034_u:5448: mānuṣye sati kalpakoṭinayutānanyāsu vā jātiṣu duḥkhā vedana vedayāmi ca ciraṃ saṃsāraduḥkhārditaḥ
T02bsu034_u:5449: kṛtvā pāpaku karma duḥkhanubhavī saṃsāramāṇaściraṃ tasmāt pāpu na kuryu adhvi tribhave yo bodhimicchecchivām // SRS_35.115 //
T02bsu034_u:5451: deśetva karmaṃ purimaku rājaśreṣṭho nāsau vimucyī purimaku duṣkṛtātaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5452: kṛtvā ca karmaṃ purimaku ghorarupaṃ sa ca cyavitva gacchennirayamavīci ghoram // SRS_35.116
T02bsu034_u:5453: hastā vicchinnāstathapi ca pāda karṇa nāsā vicchinnā bahuvidha nantakalpān
T02bsu034_u:5454: netrā ca mahyaṃ balaśo hṛtā kṣipitvā utkṣipta daṇḍairvicaratu cārikāyām //
T02bsu034_u:5455: tyaktvā svakāye śira kara bodhihetoḥ putrāśca dārānnayana tathātmamāṃsam /
T02bsu034_u:5456: hastāṃśca pādān parityaji hṛṣṭacitto no ca kṣapemī purimaku pāpakarma //
T02bsu034_u:5457: rājā abhūvaṃ tada ahu śūradatto te putra mahyaṃ carimaka dharmapālāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5458: padmottaro 'yaṃ āsi supuṣpacandro vasunandi āsīddaśabalu śāntirājaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5459: si nārisaṃgho suvipula kṣatriyāśco gṛhapatī ye balapati ye camātyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5460: śreṣṭhī tathaiva naigama kodṛrājā sarve 'pyabhūṣī daśabala niṣkileśāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5461: kumāra evācaritamanantakalpaṃ dṛṣṭvān buddhān dhutaguṇa niṣkileśāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5462: te te mi duḥkhā tada anubhūtapūrvā carantu śreṣṭhāṃ ima bodhicaryām //
T02bsu034_u:5463: yo bodhisattvaḥ pratiṣṭhita dhāraṇīye maitrāvihārī acalitu aprakampī /
T02bsu034_u:5465: nāsau kadācid vrajati apāyabhūmiṃ pūjetva buddhān dhutaguṇa niṣkileśān //
T02bsu034_u:5466: yo icchi buddho kathamiha dharmasvāmī dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacitu lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5467: so śīlarakṣī aśabala apravedhā deśeti dharmaṃ pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye //
T02bsu034_u:5471: tasmāttarhi kumāra ya ākāṅkṣedbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kimityahaṃ sukhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyamiti, tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śīlaskandhe supratiṣṭhitena bhavitavyam,
T02bsu034_u:5473: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:5474: yaḥ śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhitu bodhisattvo hitaiṣicitto vicarati cārikāyām /
T02bsu034_u:5475: kṣipraṃ sa gatvā abhiratibuddhakṣetraṃ kṣāntiṃṃ labhitvā bhaviṣyati dharmarājaḥ // SRS_36.1
T02bsu034_u:5476: tasmāt samagrā bhavatha aduṣṭacittāḥ sarve ca bhogā satata manāpakārī /
T02bsu034_u:5477: dṛṣṭvā ca buddhān śirighana aprameyān bodhiṃ spṛśitvā bhaviṣyatha dharmasvāmī // SRS_36.2
T02bsu034_u:5478: tasmācchruṇitvā ima vara ānuśaṃsān dṛṣṭā ca bhikṣūn parama suśīlavantā /
T02bsu034_u:5479: niḥśāṭhiyeno vidu sada sevitavyāḥ samādhiptāptā bhaviṣyatha nocireṇa //
T02bsu034_u:5481: tathaiva bhūyo ratanavarāṇa pūrṇāḥ kṣetrā bhaveyurvālikagaṅgatulyāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5482: dānādhimukto bhaviya sa bodhisattva ekaika rātriṃdivamiha dānu dadyāt /
T02bsu034_u:5483: evaṃ dadan so bahuvidha kalpakoṭīḥ no viṣṭhitaḥ syād vālika gaṅgatulyāḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5484: yaśco samādhiṃ imumiha bodhisattvo śrutvāna dhāreta sugatavarāṇa gañjam /
T02bsu034_u:5485: yaḥ puṇyaskandho bhavati gṛhītu teno tat sarvadānaṃ kalamapi nānubhoti //
T02bsu034_u:5487: eṣo varo anupama puṇyaskandho jñānasya kośa aparimitākaropama /
T02bsu034_u:5488: śrāddho naro yo imu ānulomikaṃ dhāreyya agraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:5489: dhāreyya eta viraja samādhi śānta mahādhano bhavati sa bodhisattvaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5490: mahāsamudro bahuvidharatanasya ākaro na tasya puṇyasya pramāṇamasti //
T02bsu034_u:5491: varehi dharmehi acintiyehi saṃbṛhito vuccati bodhisattvaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5492: na tasya bodhāya kadāci saṃśayo ya uddiśeyāti imaḥ samādhim // SRS_36.9 //
T02bsu034_u:5493: saṃsthāpya lokācariyaṃ vināyakaṃ buddhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ svayaṃbhuvam /
T02bsu034_u:5494: yaḥ puṇyaskandhena vareṇupeto acintiyo yasya pramāṇu nāsti // SRS_36.10 //
T02bsu034_u:5495: na uttaro tasya ca sattva kaścit mahāsahasrāya kadāci vidyate /
T02bsu034_u:5496: yaḥ puṇyaskandhena samo bhaveta jñānena vāsādṛśācintiyena // SRS_36.11 //
T02bsu034_u:5497: anyatra yaḥ śrutva samādhimetaṃ dhāreyya vāceyya paryāpuṇeyyā /
T02bsu034_u:5498: paryeṣamāṇo 'tula budhabodhiṃ na tasya jñānena samo bhaveta // SRS_36.12
T02bsu034_u:5499: sacet kumārā siya ayu dharmarūpa yaḥ puṇyaskandho upacitu tena bhoti /
T02bsu034_u:5500: dhāratu vācetu imaṃ samādhiṃ na so viceyyā iha pṛthulokadhātuṣu //
T02bsu034_u:5501: tasmāt kumāreha ya bodhisattvo ākāṅkṣate pūjitu sarvabuddhān /
T02bsu034_u:5503: asaṅganirdeśapadārthakovido atīta utpanna tathāgatāṃśca dhāretu vācetu imaṃ samādhim // SRS_36.14
T02bsu034_u:5504: eṣā hi sā bodhi tathāgatānāṃ śraddhehi mahyaṃ vacanaṃ kumārāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5505: na bhāṣate vācamṛṣāṃ tathāgato na hīdṛśāḥ sattva mṛṣāṃ vadanti //
T02bsu034_u:5506: yasmin mayā śodhitu ātmagrāho itaḥ pure kalpaśatānacintiyān /
T02bsu034_u:5507: śreṣṭhā carantena pi bodhicārikāṃ paryeṣamāṇena imāṃ samādhim // SRS_36.16
T02bsu034_u:5508: tasmādimaṃ śrutva atha dharmagañjaṃ yaḥ sūtrakoṭīnayutāna āgamaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5509: yaḥ puṇyaskandho vipulo acintiyo yeno laghuṃ budhyati buddhajñānam //
T02bsu034_u:5511: paryantu dharmāṇa na teṣa labhyate yāṃ so sadā nirdiśate viśāradaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5512: chinditva bhinditva mahāsahasraṃ śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5513: na tveva te sūtraśatā acintiyān pramātu yaṃ bhāṣati so aviṣṭhitaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5514: āśvāsa praśvāsa gaṇetu śakyaṃ sarveṣa sattvāniha buddhakṣetre /
T02bsu034_u:5515: paryantu sūtrāṇa na teṣa śakyaṃ yān bhāṣate so 'tra samādhiye sthitaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5516: buddhāna kṣetrā yatha gaṅgavālikā ye teṣa sattvā gati teṣūpapannāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5517: gaṇetu te śakyamathāpi cintituṃ na teṣa sūtrāṇa ya nityu bhāṣate //
T02bsu034_u:5519: gaṇetu śakyamita kalpakoṭibhiḥ mahāsamudreṣviha yātti vālikāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5520: nadīṣu kuṇḍeṣu hradeṣu tadvad ananta sūtrānta sa yat prabhāṣate //
T02bsu034_u:5521: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ bahukalpakoṭiṣu ya āpaskandhaḥ sada tatra tiṣṭhati /
T02bsu034_u:5522: śatāya bhinnāya vālāgrakoṭiyo svarāṅga teṣāṃ na tu śakyu sarvaśaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5523: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ bahukalpakoṭibhirye sattva āsan purimeṇa tatra /
T02bsu034_u:5524: ya ātmabhāve vinibaddhasārā na teṣa sūtrāntanirhāra jānitum // SRS_36.24
T02bsu034_u:5525: gaṇetu śakyaṃ ruta sarvaprāṇināṃ ye santi sattvā daśasu diśāsu /
T02bsu034_u:5526: na śakyu sūtrānta gaṇetu tasya yad bhāṣate 'sau satatamaviṣṭhitaḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5528: viniścaye bhūtanayeṣu śikṣito viśālabuddhiḥ sada harṣaprajñaḥ // SRS_36.26
T02bsu034_u:5530: ghoṣasvabhāvaṃ pṛthu sarva jānatī śabdāṃśca tān nirdiśato na sajjati //
T02bsu034_u:5531: asakta so vuccati dharmabhāṇako na sajjate sarvajagasya bhāṣataḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5532: praśnāna nirdeśapadehi kovidaḥ tathāhi teno paramārthu jñātaḥ // SRS_36.28
T02bsu034_u:5533: ekasya sūtrasyupadeśakoṭiyo acintiyāṃ niordiśato na sajjati /
T02bsu034_u:5535: asaṅganirdeśapadārthakovido bhāṣantu so parṣagato na sajjate // SRS_36.29
T02bsu034_u:5536: yaḥ susthito bhoti iho samādhiye sa bodhisattvo bhavatī akampiyaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5538: yathaiva meruracalo akampiyaḥ sarvehi vātehi na śakya kampitum /
T02bsu034_u:5539: tathaiva bhikṣurvidu dharmabhāṇakaṃ kampetu śakyaṃ na parapravādibhiḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5540: mahāsahasreṣviha lokadhātuṣu ye parvatā ukta akampanīyāḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5541: te śakya vātena prakampanāya na tveva dharme sthitu śūnyi bhikṣuḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5542: ya śūnyatāyāṃ satataṃ prayukto buddhāna eṣo niyataṃ vihāraḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5543: prajānatī niścitu dharma śūnyāṃ sa sarvavādībhi na śakyu kṣobhitum //
T02bsu034_u:5545: anābhibhūtaśca aninditaśca imumuddiśitvāna samādhi śāntam // SRS_36.34 //
T02bsu034_u:5546: gatiṃ gato bhoti sa śunyatāyāṃ sarveṣu dharmeṣu na kāṅkṣate 'sau /
T02bsu034_u:5547: anantajñāne sada supratiṣṭhito imumuddiśitvāna samādhi śāntam // SRS_36.35
T02bsu034_u:5548: balāni bodhyaṅga na tasya durlabhā pratisaṃvido ṛddhividhī acintiyā /
T02bsu034_u:5549: abhijña no tasya bhavanti durlabhā dhāretva vācetva ima samādhim //
T02bsu034_u:5551: bhavābhivṛttasya na tasya durlabhaṃ anantajñānena jināna darśanam /
T02bsu034_u:5552: saṃbuddha koṭīnayutānacintiyān so drakṣyate etu samādhi dhārayan //
T02bsu034_u:5553: sarveṣa co teṣa jināna antike sa śroṣyate etu samādhi śāntam /
T02bsu034_u:5554: vareṇa jñānena upetu bheṣyatī pratisaṃvidāsu vaśa pāramiṃ gataḥ //
T02bsu034_u:5555: saced bhavenmaṇiratanāna pūrṇā mahāsahasrā iya lokadhātuḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5556: ye divya śreṣṭhā maṇiratanāḥ pradhānā heṣṭaṃ upādāya bhavāgru yāvat //
T02bsu034_u:5557: yāvanta kṣetrā bahuvidha te anantā jāmbūnadāsaṃstṛta pūrṇa sarve /
T02bsu034_u:5558: dānaṃ dade jinavareṣu sarvaṃ bhūmītalādupari bhavāgra yāvat // SRS_36.40
T02bsu034_u:5559: yāvanti santi bahu vividhā hi sattvā dānaṃ dadeyurvividhamanantakalpān /
T02bsu034_u:5560: buddhāna dadyuḥ satatamaviṣṭhihanto bodhyarthiko co daditu dānaskandham //
T02bsu034_u:5562: na sa dānaskandhaḥ purimaku yāti saṃkhyāṃ yaḥ śūnyatāyāmabhiratu bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_36.42
T02bsu034_u:5563: taṃ co labhitvā sa hi naru puṇyavanto dānaṃ dadeti vipulu janetva śraddhām
T02bsu034_u:5564: paryeṣamāṇo atuliya buddhabodhiṃ aupamyametaṃ kṛtu puruṣottamena //
T02bsu034_u:5565: yaśco samādhimimu varu śreṣṭha gṛhṇeccatuṣpadāṃ gātha sa tuṣṭacittaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5566: yaḥ puṇyaskandho upacitu tena bhoti tat sarvadānaṃ śatimakalā nu bhoti //
T02bsu034_u:5568: na tāva śīghraṃ pratilabhi buddhajñānaṃ dānaṃ dadet so hitakaru bodhisattvaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5569: aśrutva etaṃ viraju samādhi śāntaṃ yatha śrutva śīghraṃ labhati sa buddhajñānam // SRS_36.45
T02bsu034_u:5570: yaśco labhitvā imu vara śāntabhūmiṃ śrutasya gotraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim /
T02bsu034_u:5571: puryāpuṇeyyā pramuditu bodhisattvaḥ sa śīghrametaṃ pratilabhi buddhajñānam
T02bsu034_u:5572: yo 'pī nidhānaṃ pratilabhi evarūpaṃ kṣetrānanantān yathariva gaṅgavālikāḥ
T02bsu034_u:5573: te co bhaveyurmaṇiratanāna pūrṇā divyāna co tathapi ca mānuṣāṇām //
T02bsu034_u:5574: durdharṣu so bhoti prebhūtakośo mahādhano dhanaratanenupetaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:5575: yo bodhisattvo labhati imaṃ samādhiṃ paryāpuṇantaḥ satatamatṛptu bhoti //
T02bsu034_u:5576: rājyaṃ labhitvā paramasamṛddha sphītaṃ na tena tuṣṭo bhavati kadāci vijñaḥ
T02bsu034_u:5577: yathā labhitvā imu virajaṃ samādhiṃ tuṣṭo udagro bhavati sa bodhisattvaḥ
T02bsu034_u:5578: te te dharmadharā bhavanti satataṃ buddhāna sarvajñināṃ dhārentī varadharmanetri vipulāṃ kṣīṇāntakāle tathā /
T02bsu034_u:5579: dharmakośadharā mahāmatidharāḥ sarvajñagañjaṃdharāḥ te te sattva sahasrakoṭiniyutāṃstoṣanti dharmasvaraiḥ // SRS_36.50 //
T02bsu034_u:5580: te te śīladhanenupeta matimān śikṣādhanāḍhyā narāḥ te te śīlavrate sthitā abhiratā dharmadrumasyāṅkurāḥ
T02bsu034_u:5581: te te raktakaṣāyacīvaradharā naiṣkramyatuṣṭāḥ sadā te te sattvahitāya apratisamāḥ sarvajñatāṃ prasthitāḥ // SRS_36.51 //

T02bsu034_u:6389: bodhisattvaiḥ parigṛhītāḥ? yadidaṃ durlabhatā ca mahābhaiṣajyatā ca ||....
T02bsu034_u:6391: yadidaṃ sarvasukhāhārakamupādāya ||.... brahmaṇā vandanīyam? yadidaṃ sarvamokṣāhārakayogena |.... nāgairnamasyanīyam? yadidaṃ sarvavāsanāsamutyāgatāmupādāya ||....yakṣairanumodanīyam? yadidaṃ sarvadurgatīnāṃ mārgacchedanatāmupādāya ||....kinnaraiḥ stavanīyam?
T02bsu034_u:6394: yadidaṃ sarvajñānāhārikamupādāya ||.... paṇḍitaiḥ paryavāptavyam? yadidaṃ avaivartyabhūmyāhāritrakamupādāya ||....dhanamanuttaram? yadidaṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ saṃpatterāhātitrakaṃ copādāya mokṣāhāritrakamupādāya ||.... dānaṃ nirāmiṣam? yadidaṃ sarvakleśaccheditrakatāmupādāya ||.... bhaiṣajyaṃ glānānām? yadidaṃ rāgadveṣamohapraśamanatāmupādāya ||.... kośo jñānasya? yadidaṃ bhāvanāmupādāya ||.... akṣayatā pratibhānasya? yadidaṃ yathābhūtajñānadarśanatāmupādāya ||.... vigamaḥ śokasya? yadidaṃ nirarthakaḥ vyādhiduḥkhabudhyanāvataraṇatāmupādāya
T02bsu034_u:6395: nairātmyaduḥkhaprajānanatāmupādāya ||.... parijñā traidhātukasya? yadidaṃ svapnamāyābudhyanatāmupādāya ||.... nāvaḥ pāramitānām? yadidaṃ adhyāaśayena parinirvātukāmānāmanityaduḥkhaśūnyatābhāvanatāmupādāya nauroghamadhyagatānām? yadidaṃ nirvāṇasyāhārakatāmupādāya ||....
T02bsu034_u:6407: saṃvartate sarvakuśaladharmāhāraṇatāyai ca sarvasattvamokṣāharaṇatāyai saṃvartate ||....udyānaṃ bodhisattvānām? yadidaṃ sarvaprītiprāmodyātmasukhena sarvasattvasukhāharaṇatāmupādāya ||
T02bsu034_u:6408: ....vidrāpaṇaṃ mārasainyānām? yadidaṃ sarvabalāhāritrakamupādāya sarvakleśaśamanaṃ copādāya || ....vidyā kṣemagāminām yadidaṃ sarvopadravakṣayāya saṃvartate ||.... arthaḥ siddhānām? yadidaṃ sarvadharmasaṃpattyāhāritrakamupādāya ||....
T02bsu034_u:6410: parājayatāyai saṃvartate || ....sahadharmeṇa tīrthikānāṃ nigrahaḥ? yadidaṃ sahadharmeṇa tīrthikānāṃ nigrahamupādāya ||....satyākāro vaiśāradyānām?
T02bsu034_u:6413: pūrvanimittamaṣṭādaśānāmāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām? yadidaṃ sarvaśukladharmāharaṇatāmupādāya || (Vaidya 302).... alaṃkāraḥ? yadidaṃ dvātriṃśatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāmāhārakamupādāya ||.... ratirmokṣakāmānām?
T02bsu034_u:6418: yadidaṃ sarvamalaprahāṇāya saṃvartate ||.... pariśuddhiḥ kāyasya? yadidaṃ sarvaglānipraśamanatāmupādāya ||.... pariniṣpattiḥ vimokṣamukhānām?
T02bsu034_u:6421: doṣasya? yadidaṃ mahāmaitryāhārikamupādāya ||.... abhūmirmohasya? yadidaṃ bhūtadharmālokāhārakamupādāya ||.... āgamaḥ saṃjñānasya? yadidaṃ sarvalaukikalokottarakāyajñānasyotpādamupādāya ||.... utpādo vidyāyāḥ?
T02bsu034_u:6432: yadidaṃ sarvasukhakṣemagamanatāmupādāya ||.... sūkṣmama? yadidaṃ nirvāṇālambanavyupaśamatāmupādāya ||.... durvijñeyam? yadidaṃ duḥkhapratijñānatāmupādāya ||.... durājānatānabhiyuktaiḥ? yadidaṃ apratilabdhapūrvatāmupādāya ||.... vivarto 'kṣarāṇām? yadidaṃ sarvavākyakathānupalabdhitāmupādāya ||.... durvijñeyo ghoṣeṇa? yadidaṃ sarvadharmācintyatāmupādāya ||.... ajñātaṃ vijñaiḥ? yadidaṃ ratnamahārthikatāmupādāya ||.... jñānaṃ surataiḥ? yadidaṃ satkārājānatāmupādāya ||.... vibuddhamalpecchaiḥ? yadidaṃ satkārājānatāmupādāya ||.... udgṛhītamāravdhavīyaiḥ? yadidaṃ anikṣiptadhuratāmupādāya ||.... dhāritaṃ smṛtimadbhiḥ? yadidaṃ kṛtāvipraṇāśatāmupādāya ||.... kṣayo duḥkhasya? yadidaṃ rāgadveṣamohasaṃvartanatāmupādāya ||.... anutpādaḥ sarvadharmāṇām? yadidaṃ sarvavijñānanirodhatāmupādāya ||.... ekanayanirdeśaḥ || yadidaṃ sarvabhavagaticyutyupapattyāyatanānāṃ sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamā iti sarvadharmānutpādyatāmupādāya? ayameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ padaśatānāṃ nirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:6433: ayaṃ sa ucyate kumāra sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcito nāma samādhiḥ ||
T02bsu034_u:6437: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T02bsu034_u:6438: vipulā buddhadharmā hi vipulo deśito nayaḥ /
T02bsu034_u:6439: vipulaṃ dharma deśitvā vipulāṃllabhate guṇān // SRS_40.1 //
T02bsu034_u:6442: vipulā cari sattvānāṃ vipulā teṣu deśitā /
T02bsu034_u:6444: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitasamādhinirdeśe dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe aprameyaiḥ sattvairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T02bsu034_u:6445: cittānyutpāditāni, aprameyāśca sattvā avaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T02bsu034_u:6448: ayaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍavikāraṃ kampitaḥ prakampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ |
T02bsu034_u:6466: sulabdhā lābhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ya imaṃ mahākaruṇāvatāradharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti |
T02bsu034_u:6467: bahubuddhaparyupāsitāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitasamādhiṃ punaḥ punaḥ śroṣyanti, śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti araṇābhāvanayā
T02bsu034_u:6470: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - udgṛhvīṣva tvamānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi, pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya |
T02bsu034_u:6471: atha khalvāyuṣmānānado bhagavantametadavocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ, kathaṃ caina dhārayāmi? bhagavānāha -
T02bsu034_u:6477: āttamanāścandraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ tāścatasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ aneke ca śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ityāryasarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitāt samādheryathālabdhaṃ samādhirājaṃ nāma mahāyānasūtraṃ parivarto nāma catvāriṃśatitamaṃ samāptam
T02bsu034_u:6478: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
T02bsu034_u:6479: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
